atk-abh02a11:3_0: 508. Idāni tadanantare jhānavibhaṅge yā tāva ayaṁ sakalassāpi suttantabhājanīyassa
atk-abh02a11:3_1: paṭhamaṁ mātikā ṭhapitā, tattha idhāti vacanaṁ pubbabhāgakaraṇīyasampadāya sampannassa
atk-abh02a11:3_3: ca tathābhāvapaṭisedhanaṁ. Vuttañhetaṁ – ‘‘idheva, bhikkhave, samaṇo…pe… suññā parappavādā
atk-abh02a11:3_4: samaṇehi aññehī’’ti (a. ni. 4.241). Bhikkhūti tesaṁ jhānānaṁ nibbattakapuggalaparidīpanaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:3_7: idamassa heṭṭhā pātimokkhasaṁvarassa upari jhānānuyogassa ca upakāradhammaparidīpanaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:3_8: Aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvīti idamassa pātimokkhato acavanadhammatāparidīpanaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:3_9: Samādāyāti idamassa sikkhāpadānaṁ anavasesato ādānaparidīpanaṁ. Sikkhatīti idamassa
atk-abh02a11:4_1: vadanti eva. Guttadvāroti idamassa chasu dvāresu saṁvihitārakkhabhāvaparidīpanaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:4_2: Bhojane mattaññūti idamassa santosādiguṇaparidīpanaṁ. Pubbarattāpararattaṁ jāgariyānuyogamanuyuttoti
atk-abh02a11:4_3: idamassa kāraṇabhāvaparidīpanaṁ. Sātaccaṁnepakkanti idamassa paññāpariggahitena vīriyena
atk-abh02a11:5_0: So abhikkante…pe… tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī hotīti idamassa sabbattha satisampajaññasamannāgatattaparidīpanaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:5_1: So vivittaṁ senāsanaṁ bhajatīti idamassa anurūpasenāsanapariggahaparidīpanaṁ. Araññaṁ…pe…
atk-abh02a11:5_3: vāti idamassa vuttappakārena senāsanena yuttabhāvaparidīpanaṁ. Nisīdatīti idamassa
atk-abh02a11:5_4: yogānurūpairiyāpathaparidīpanaṁ. Parimukhaṁ satiṁ upaṭṭhapetvāti idamassa yogārambhaparidīpanaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:5_5: So abhijjhaṁ loke pahāyātiādi panassa kammaṭṭhānānuyogena nīvaraṇappahānaparidīpanaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:5_6: Tasseva pahīnanīvaraṇassa vivicceva kāmehītiādi paṭipāṭiyā jhānuppattiparidīpanaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:6_0: Api ca idha bhikkhūti imasmiṁ sāsane jhānuppādako bhikkhu. Idāni yasmā jhānuppādakena
atk-abh02a11:6_1: bhikkhunā cattāri sīlāni sodhetabbāni, tasmāssa pātimokkhasaṁvarasaṁvutoti iminā
atk-abh02a11:6_3: Samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesūti iminā tesaṁ dvinnaṁ sīlānaṁ anavasesato ādānaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:6_4: Indriyesu guttadvāroti iminā indriyasaṁvarasīlaṁ. Bhojane mattaññūti iminā paccayasannissitasīlaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:6_5: Pubbarattāpararattantiādinā sīle patiṭṭhitassa jhānabhāvanāya upakārake dhamme. So
atk-abh02a11:6_6: abhikkantetiādinā tesaṁ dhammānaṁ aparihānāya kammaṭṭhānassa ca asammosāya satisampajaññasamāyogaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:6_7: So vivittantiādinā bhāvanānurūpasenāsanapariggahaṁ. Soaraññagato vātiādinā taṁ senāsanaṁ
atk-abh02a11:6_9: jhānabhāvanārambhena jhānapaccanīkadhammappahānaṁ. So ime pañca nīvaraṇe pahāyātiādinā
atk-abh02a11:9_0: 509. Idāni yathānikkhittaṁ mātikaṁ paṭipāṭiyā bhājetvā dassetuṁ idhāti imissā diṭṭhiyātiādi
atk-abh02a11:9_1: āraddhaṁ. Tattha imissā diṭṭhiyātiādīhi dasahi padehi sikkhattayasaṅkhātaṁ sabbaññubuddhasāsanameva
atk-abh02a11:9_2: kathitaṁ. Tañhi buddhena bhagavatā diṭṭhattā diṭṭhīti vuccati. Tasseva khamanavasena
atk-abh02a11:9_3: khanti, ruccanavasena ruci, gahaṇavasena ādāyo, sabhāvaṭṭhena dhammo, sikkhitabbaṭṭhena
atk-abh02a11:9_4: vinayo, tadubhayenāpi dhammavinayo, pavuttavasena pāvacanaṁ, seṭṭhacariyaṭṭhena brahmacariyaṁ,
atk-abh02a11:9_5: anusiṭṭhidānavasena satthusāsananti vuccati. Tasmā imissā diṭṭhiyātiādīsu imissā
atk-abh02a11:9_6: buddhadiṭṭhiyā, imissā buddhakhantiyā, imissā buddharuciyā, imasmiṁ buddhaādāye,
atk-abh02a11:10_0: ‘‘Ye ca kho tvaṁ, gotami, dhamme jāneyyāsi – ‘ime dhammā sarāgāya saṁvattanti no
atk-abh02a11:10_1: virāgāya, saṁyogāya saṁvattanti no visaṁyogāya, ācayāya saṁvattanti no apacayāya,
atk-abh02a11:10_2: upādāya saṁvattanti no paṭinissaggiyā, mahicchatāya saṁvattanti no appicchatāya,
atk-abh02a11:10_3: asantuṭṭhiyā saṁvattanti no santuṭṭhiyā, saṅgaṇikāya saṁvattanti no pavivekāya, kosajjāya
atk-abh02a11:10_4: saṁvattanti no vīriyārambhāya, dubbharatāya saṁvattanti no subharatāyā’ti ekaṁsena
atk-abh02a11:10_5: hi, gotami, dhāreyyāsi – ‘neso dhammo, neso vinayo, netaṁ satthusāsana’nti. Ye ca
atk-abh02a11:10_6: kho tvaṁ, gotami, dhamme jāneyyāsi – ‘ime dhammā virāgāya saṁvattanti no sarāgāya…pe…
atk-abh02a11:10_7: subharatāya saṁvattanti no dubbharatāyā’ti. Ekaṁsena hi, gotami, dhāreyyāsi – ‘eso
atk-abh02a11:10_8: dhammo, eso vinayo, etaṁ satthusāsana’’nti (a. ni. 8.53; cūḷava. 406).
atk-abh02a11:11: Evaṁ vutte imasmiṁ buddhadhammavinaye , imasmiṁ buddhapāvacane, imasmiṁ buddhabrahmacariye, imasmiṁ buddhasatthusāsaneti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-abh02a11:12_0: Apicetaṁ sikkhāttayasaṅkhātaṁ sakalaṁ sāsanaṁ bhagavatā diṭṭhattā sammādiṭṭhipaccayattā
atk-abh02a11:12_1: sammādiṭṭhipubbaṅgamattā ca diṭṭhi, bhagavato khamanavasena khanti, ruccanavasena
atk-abh02a11:12_2: ruci, gahaṇavasena ādāyo. Attano kārakaṁ apāyesu apatamānaṁ dhāretīti dhammo. Sova
atk-abh02a11:12_3: saṁkilesapakkhaṁ vinatīti vinayo. Dhammo ca so vinayo cāti dhammavinayo. Kusaladhammehi
atk-abh02a11:12_4: vā akusaladhammānaṁ esa vinayoti dhammavinayo. Teneva vuttaṁ – ‘‘ye ca kho tvaṁ,
atk-abh02a11:12_5: gotami, dhamme jāneyyāsi – ‘ime dhammā virāgāya saṁvattanti no sarāgāya…pe… ekaṁsena,
atk-abh02a11:12_6: gotami, dhāreyyāsi ‘eso dhammo, eso vinayo, etaṁ satthusāsana’nti.
atk-abh02a11:13: Dhammena vā vinayo, na daṇḍādīhīti dhammavinayo, vuttampi cetaṁ –
atk-abh02a11:15: Adaṇḍena asatthena, nāgo danto mahesinā’’ti. (cūḷava. 342; ma. ni. 2.352);
atk-abh02a11:18_0: Dhammāya vā vinayo dhammavinayo. Anavajjadhammatthañhesa vinayo, na bhavabhogāmisatthaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:18_1: Tenāha bhagavā – ‘‘nayidaṁ, bhikkhave, brahmacariyaṁ vussati janakuhanattha’’nti
atk-abh02a11:18_2: (a. ni. 4.25) vitthāro. Puṇṇattheropi āha – ‘‘anupādāparinibbānatthaṁ kho, āvuso,
atk-abh02a11:18_3: bhagavati brahmacariyaṁ vussatī’’ti (ma. ni. 1.259). Visiṭṭhaṁ vā nayatīti vinayo.
atk-abh02a11:18_4: Dhammato vinayo dhammavinayo. Saṁsāradhammato hi sokādidhammato vā esa visiṭṭhaṁ
atk-abh02a11:18_5: nibbānaṁ nayati. Dhammassa vā vinayo, na titthakarānanti dhammavinayo; dhammabhūto
atk-abh02a11:18_6: hi bhagavā, tasseva vinayo. Yasmā vā dhammāyeva abhiññeyyā pariññeyyā pahātabbā bhāvetabbā
atk-abh02a11:18_7: sacchikātabbā ca, tasmā esa dhammesu vinayo, na sattesu, na jīvesu cāti dhammavinayo.
atk-abh02a11:18_8: Sātthasabyañjanatādīhi aññesaṁ vacanato padhānaṁ vacananti pavacanaṁ; pavacanameva
atk-abh02a11:18_9: pāvacanaṁ. Sabbacariyāhi visiṭṭhacariyābhāvena brahmacariyaṁ. Devamanussānaṁ satthubhūtassa
atk-abh02a11:18_10: bhagavato sāsananti satthusāsanaṁ; satthubhūtaṁ vā sāsanantipi satthusāsanaṁ. ‘‘So
atk-abh02a11:18_11: vo mamaccayena satthā’’ti (dī. ni. 2.216) hi dhammavinayova satthāti vuttoti evametesaṁ
atk-abh02a11:19_0: Yasmā pana imasmiṁyeva sāsane sabbapakārajjhānanibbattako bhikkhu dissati, na aññatra,
atk-abh02a11:19_1: tasmā tattha tattha ‘imissā’ti ca ‘imasmi’nti ca ayaṁ niyamo katoti veditabboti.
atk-abh02a11:20_0: 510. Bhikkhuniddese samaññāyāti paññattiyā, vohārenāti attho. Samaññāya eva hi ekacco
atk-abh02a11:20_1: bhikkhūti paññāyati. Tathā hi nimantanādimhi bhikkhūsu gaṇīyamānesu sāmaṇerepi gahetvā
atk-abh02a11:20_2: ‘sataṁ bhikkhū, sahassaṁ bhikkhū’ti vadanti. Paṭiññāyāti attano paṭijānanena. Paṭiññāyapi
atk-abh02a11:20_3: hi ekacco bhikkhūti paññāyati. Tassa ‘‘ko ettha āvuso’’ti? ‘‘Ahaṁ, āvuso, bhikkhū’’ti
atk-abh02a11:20_4: evamādīsu (a. ni. 10.96) sambhavo daṭṭhabbo. Ayaṁ pana ānandattherena vuttattā dhammikā
atk-abh02a11:20_5: paṭiññā. Rattibhāge pana dussīlāpi paṭipathaṁ āgacchantā ‘‘ko etthā’’ti vutte adhammikāya
atk-abh02a11:21_0: Bhikkhatīti yācati. Yo hi koci bhikkhati, bhikkhaṁ esati gavesati, so taṁ labhatu
atk-abh02a11:21_1: vā mā vā, atha kho bhikkhatīti bhikkhu. Bhikkhakoti byañjanena padaṁ vaḍḍhitaṁ; bhikkhanadhammatāya
atk-abh02a11:21_2: bhikkhūti attho. Bhikkhācariyaṁ ajjhupagatoti buddhādīhi ajjhupagataṁ bhikkhācariyaṁ
atk-abh02a11:21_3: ajjhupagatattā bhikkhācariyaṁ ajjhupagato nāma. Yo hi koci appaṁ vā mahantaṁ vā bhogakkhandhaṁ
atk-abh02a11:21_4: pahāya agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito, kasigorakkhādīhi jīvitakappanaṁ hitvā liṅgasampaṭicchaneneva
atk-abh02a11:21_5: bhikkhācariyaṁ ajjhupagatoti bhikkhu. Parappaṭibaddhajīvikattā vā vihāramajjhe kājabhattaṁ
atk-abh02a11:21_6: bhuñjamānopi bhikkhācariyaṁ ajjhupagatoti bhikkhu. Piṇḍiyālopabhojanaṁ nissāya pabbajjāya
atk-abh02a11:22_0: Agghaphassavaṇṇabhedena bhinnaṁ paṭaṁ dhāretīti bhinnapaṭadharo. Tattha satthakacchedanena
atk-abh02a11:22_1: agghabhedo veditabbo. Sahassagghanakopi hi paṭo satthakena khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṁ chinno
atk-abh02a11:22_2: bhinnaggho hoti, purimagghato upaḍḍhampi na agghati. Suttasaṁsibbanena phassabhedo
atk-abh02a11:22_3: veditabbo. Sukhasamphassopi hi paṭo suttehi saṁsibbito bhinnaphasso hoti, kharasamphassataṁ
atk-abh02a11:22_4: pāpuṇāti. Sūcimalādīhi vaṇṇabhedo veditabbo. Suparisuddhopi hi paṭo sūcikammato paṭṭhāya
atk-abh02a11:22_5: sūcimalena, hatthasedamalajallikādīhi , avasāne rajanakappakaraṇehi ca bhinnavaṇṇo
atk-abh02a11:22_6: hoti, pakativaṇṇaṁ vijahati. Evaṁ tīhākārehi bhinnapaṭadhāraṇato bhinnapaṭadharoti
atk-abh02a11:22_7: bhikkhu. Gihīvatthavisabhāgānaṁ vā kāsāvānaṁ dhāraṇamatteneva bhinnapaṭadharoti bhikkhu.
atk-abh02a11:23_0: Bhindati pāpake akusale dhammeti bhikkhu. Sotāpattimaggena pañca kilese bhindatīti
atk-abh02a11:23_1: bhikkhu. Sakadāgāmimaggena cattāro, anāgāmimaggena cattāro, arahattamaggena aṭṭha
atk-abh02a11:23_2: kilese bhindatīti bhikkhu. Ettāvatā cattāro maggaṭṭhā dassitā. Bhinnattāti iminā
atk-abh02a11:23_3: pana cattāro phalaṭṭhā. Sotāpanno hi sotāpattimaggena pañca kilese bhinditvā ṭhito.
atk-abh02a11:23_4: Sakadāgāmī sakadāgāmimaggena cattāro, anāgāmī anāgāmimaggena cattāro, arahā arahattamaggena
atk-abh02a11:23_5: aṭṭha kilese bhinditvā ṭhito. Evamayaṁ catubbidho phalaṭṭho bhinnattā pāpakānaṁ akusalānaṁ
atk-abh02a11:24_0: Odhiso kilesānaṁ pahānāti ettha dve odhī – maggodhi ca kilesodhi ca. Odhi nāma sīmā,
atk-abh02a11:24_1: mariyādā. Tattha sotāpanno maggodhinā odhiso kilesānaṁ pahānā bhikkhu. Tassa hi catūsu
atk-abh02a11:24_2: maggesu ekeneva odhinā kilesā pahīnā, na sakalena maggacatukkena. Sakadāgāmīanāgāmīsupi
atk-abh02a11:24_3: eseva nayo. Sotāpanno ca kilesodhināpi odhiso kilesānaṁ pahānā bhikkhu. Tassa hi
atk-abh02a11:24_4: pahātabbakilesesu odhināva kilesā pahīnā, na sabbena sabbaṁ. Arahā pana anodhisova
atk-abh02a11:24_5: kilesānaṁ pahānā bhikkhu. Tassa hi maggacatukkena anodhināva kilesā pahīnā, na ekāya
atk-abh02a11:24_6: maggasīmāya. Pahātabbakilesesu ca anodhisova kilesā pahīnā. Ekāpi hi kilesasīmā ṭhitā
atk-abh02a11:24_7: nāma natthi. Evaṁ so ubhayathāpi anodhiso kilesānaṁ pahānā bhikkhu.
atk-abh02a11:25_0: Sekkhoti puthujjanakalyāṇakena saddhiṁ satta ariyā. Tisso sikkhā sikkhantīti sekkhā.
atk-abh02a11:25_1: Tesu yo koci sekkho bhikkhuti veditabbo. Na sikkhatīti asekkho. Sekkhadhamme atikkamma
atk-abh02a11:25_2: aggaphale ṭhito tato uttari sikkhitabbābhāvato khīṇāsavo asekkhoti vuccati. Avaseso
atk-abh02a11:25_3: puthujjanabhikkhu tisso sikkhā neva sikkhati, na sikkhitvā ṭhitoti nevasekkhanāsekkhoti veditabbo.
atk-abh02a11:26_0: Sīlaggaṁ samādhiggaṁ paññaggaṁ vimuttagganti idaṁ aggaṁ patvā ṭhitattā aggo bhikkhu
atk-abh02a11:26_1: nāma. Bhadroti apāpako. Kalyāṇaputhujjanādayo hi yāva arahā tāva bhadrena sīlena
atk-abh02a11:26_2: samādhinā paññāya vimuttiyā vimuttiñāṇadassanena ca samannāgatattā bhadro bhikkhūti
atk-abh02a11:26_3: saṅkhyaṁ gacchanti. Maṇḍo bhikkhūti pasanno bhikkhu; sappimaṇḍo viya anāvilo vippasannoti
atk-abh02a11:26_4: attho. Sāroti tehiyeva sīlasārādīhi samannāgatattā, nīlasamannāgamena nīlo paṭo viya,
atk-abh02a11:26_5: sāro bhikkhūti veditabbo. Vigatakilesapheggubhāvato vā khīṇāsavova sāroti veditabbo.
atk-abh02a11:27_0: Tattha ca ‘‘bhindati pāpake akusale dhammeti bhikkhu, odhiso kilesānaṁ pahānā bhikkhu,
atk-abh02a11:27_1: sekkho bhikkhū’’ti imesu tīsu ṭhānesu satta sekkhā kathitā. ‘‘Bhinnattā pāpakānaṁ
atk-abh02a11:27_2: akusalānaṁ dhammānanti bhikkhu, anodhiso kilesānaṁ pahānā bhikkhu, asekkho bhikkhu,
atk-abh02a11:27_3: aggo bhikkhu, maṇḍo bhikkhū’’ti imesu pañcasu ṭhānesu khīṇāsavova kathito. ‘‘Nevasekkhanāsekkho’’ti
atk-abh02a11:27_4: ettha puthujjanova kathito. Sesaṭṭhānesu puthujjanakalyāṇako, satta sekkhā, khīṇāsavoti
atk-abh02a11:28_0: Evaṁ samaññādīhi bhikkhuṁ dassetvā idāni upasampadāvasena dassetuṁ samaggena saṅghenātiādimāha.
atk-abh02a11:28_1: Tattha samaggena saṅghenāti sabbantimena paricchedena pañcavaggakaraṇīye kamme yāvatikā
atk-abh02a11:28_2: bhikkhū kammappattā, tesaṁ āgatattā chandārahānaṁ chandassa āhaṭattā sammukhībhūtānañca
atk-abh02a11:28_3: appaṭikkosanato ekasmiṁ kamme samaggabhāvaṁ upagatena. Ñatticatutthenāti tīhi anussāvanāhi
atk-abh02a11:28_4: ekāya ca ñattiyā kātabbena. Kammenāti dhammikena vinayakammena. Akuppenāti vatthuñattianussāvanasīmāparisasampattisampannattā
atk-abh02a11:28_5: akopetabbataṁ appaṭikkositabbataṁ upagatena. Ṭhānārahenāti kāraṇārahena satthusāsanārahena.
atk-abh02a11:29_0: Upasampanno nāma uparibhāvaṁ samāpanno, pattoti attho. Bhikkhubhāvo hi uparibhāvo.
atk-abh02a11:29_1: Tañcesa yathāvuttena kammena samāpannattā upasampannoti vuccati. Etena yā imā ehibhikkhūpasampadā,
atk-abh02a11:29_5: imā tissova thāvarā. Sesā buddhe dharamāneyeva ahesuṁ. Tāsu upasampadāsu imasmiṁ
atk-abh02a11:30_0: 511. Pātimokkhasaṁvaraniddese pātimokkhanti sikkhāpadasīlaṁ. Tañhi, yo naṁ pāti rakkhati,
atk-abh02a11:30_1: taṁ mokkheti mocayati āpāyikādīhi dukkhehi, tasmā pātimokkhanti vuttaṁ. Sīlaṁ patiṭṭhātiādīni
atk-abh02a11:30_2: tasseva vevacanāni. Tattha sīlanti kāmañcetaṁ saha kammavācāpariyosānena ijjhanakassa
atk-abh02a11:30_3: pātimokkhassa vevacanaṁ, evaṁ santepi dhammato etaṁ sīlaṁ nāma pāṇātipātādīhi vā
atk-abh02a11:30_4: viramantassa vattappaṭipattiṁ vā pūrentassa cetanādayo dhammā veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṁ
atk-abh02a11:30_5: paṭisambhidāyaṁ ‘‘kiṁ sīla’’nti? Cetanā sīlaṁ, cetasikaṁ sīlaṁ, saṁvaro sīlaṁ, avītikkamo
atk-abh02a11:31_0: Tattha cetanā sīlaṁ nāma pāṇātipātādīhi vā viramantassa vattapaṭipattiṁ vā pūrentassa
atk-abh02a11:31_1: cetanā. Cetasikaṁ sīlaṁ nāma pāṇātipātādīhi viramantassa virati. Apica cetanā sīlaṁ
atk-abh02a11:31_2: nāma pāṇātipātādīni pajahantassa satta kammapathacetanā. Cetasikaṁ sīlaṁ nāma ‘‘abhijjhaṁ
atk-abh02a11:31_3: pahāya vigatābhijjhena cetasā viharatī’’tiādinā nayena saṁyuttamahāvagge vuttā anabhijjhāabyāpādasammādiṭṭhidhammā.
atk-abh02a11:31_4: Saṁvaro sīlanti ettha pañcavidhena saṁvaro veditabbo – pātimokkhasaṁvaro, satisaṁvaro,
atk-abh02a11:31_5: ñāṇasaṁvaro , khantisaṁvaro, vīriyasaṁvaroti. Tassa nānākaraṇaṁ visuddhimagge (visuddhi.
atk-abh02a11:31_6: 1.6) vuttaṁ. Avītikkamo sīlanti samādiṇṇasīlassa kāyikavācasiko avītikkamo. Ettha
atk-abh02a11:31_7: ca saṁvarasīlaṁ avītikkamasīlanti idameva nippariyāyato sīlaṁ; cetanā sīlaṁ cetasikaṁ
atk-abh02a11:32_0: Yasmā pana pātimokkhasaṁvarasīlena bhikkhu sāsane patiṭṭhāti nāma, tasmā taṁ ‘patiṭṭhā’ti
atk-abh02a11:32_1: vuttaṁ; patiṭṭhahati vā ettha bhikkhu, kusaladhammā eva vā ettha patiṭṭhahantīti
atk-abh02a11:33: ‘‘Sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño, cittaṁ paññañca bhāvayaṁ;
atk-abh02a11:34: Ātāpī nipako bhikkhu, so imaṁ vijaṭaye jaṭa’’nti ca. (saṁ. ni. 1.23);
atk-abh02a11:35: ‘‘Patiṭṭhā , mahārāja, sīlaṁ sabbesaṁ kusaladhammāna’’nti ca ‘‘sīle patiṭṭhitassa kho, mahārāja, sabbe kusalā dhammā na parihāyantī’’ti (mi. pa. 2.1.9) ca ādisuttavasena veditabbo.
atk-abh02a11:37: ‘‘Tasmātiha tvaṁ, uttiya, ādimeva visodhehi kusalesu dhammesu. Ko cādi kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ? Sīlañca suvisuddhaṁ diṭṭhi ca ujukā’’ti (saṁ. ni. 5.382).
atk-abh02a11:38_0: Yathā hi nagaravaḍḍhakī nagaraṁ māpetukāmo paṭhamaṁ nagaraṭṭhānaṁ sodheti, tato aparabhāge
atk-abh02a11:38_1: vīthicatukkasiṅghāṭakādiparicchedena vibhajitvā nagaraṁ māpeti; evameva yogāvacaro
atk-abh02a11:38_2: āditova sīlaṁ visodheti, tato aparabhāge samathavipassanāmaggaphalanibbānāni sacchikaroti.
atk-abh02a11:38_3: Yathā vā pana rajako paṭhamaṁ tīhi khārehi vatthaṁ dhovitvā parisuddhe vatthe yadicchakaṁ
atk-abh02a11:38_4: raṅgajātaṁ upaneti; yathā vā pana cheko cittakāro rūpaṁ likhitukāmo āditova bhittiparikammaṁ
atk-abh02a11:38_5: karoti, tato aparabhāge rūpaṁ samuṭṭhāpeti; evameva yogāvacaro āditova sīlaṁ visodhetvā
atk-abh02a11:38_6: aparabhāge samathavipassanādayo dhamme sacchikaroti. Tasmā sīlaṁ ‘‘ādī’’ti vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:39_0: Tadetaṁ caraṇasarikkhatāya caraṇaṁ. Caraṇāti hi pādā vuccanti. Yathā hi chinnacaraṇassa
atk-abh02a11:39_1: purisassa disaṁgamanābhisaṅkhāro na jāyati, paripuṇṇapādasseva jāyati; evameva yassa
atk-abh02a11:39_2: sīlaṁ bhinnaṁ hoti khaṇḍaṁ aparipuṇṇaṁ, tassa nibbānagamanāya ñāṇagamanaṁ na sampajjati.
atk-abh02a11:39_3: Yassa pana taṁ abhinnaṁ hoti akkhaṇḍaṁ paripuṇṇaṁ tassa nibbānagamanāya ñāṇagamanaṁ
atk-abh02a11:40_0: Tadetaṁ saṁyamanavasena saṁyamo, saṁvaraṇavasena saṁvaro. Ubhayenāpi sīlasaṁyamo
atk-abh02a11:40_1: ceva sīlasaṁvaro ca kathito. Vacanattho panettha saṁyameti vītikkamavipphandanaṁ,
atk-abh02a11:40_2: puggalaṁ vā saṁyameti, vītikkamavasena tassa vipphandituṁ na detīti saṁyamo. Vītikkamassa
atk-abh02a11:40_3: pavesanadvāraṁ saṁvarati pidahatītipi saṁvaro. Mokkhanti uttamaṁ mukhabhūtaṁ vā.
atk-abh02a11:40_4: Yathā hi sattānaṁ catubbidho āhāro mukhena pavisitvā aṅgamaṅgāni pharati, evaṁ yoginopi
atk-abh02a11:40_5: catubhūmakakusalaṁ sīlamukhena pavisitvā atthasiddhiṁ sampādeti. Tena vuttaṁ ‘‘mokkha’’nti.
atk-abh02a11:40_6: Pamukhe sādhūti pāmokkhaṁ; pubbaṅgamaṁ seṭṭhaṁ padhānanti attho. Kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ
atk-abh02a11:40_7: samāpattiyāti catubhūmakakusalānaṁ paṭilābhatthāya pāmokkhaṁ pubbaṅgamaṁ seṭṭhaṁ
atk-abh02a11:41_0: Kāyiko avītikkamoti tividhaṁ kāyasucaritaṁ. Vācasikoti catubbidhaṁ vacīsucaritaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:41_1: Kāyikavācasikoti tadubhayaṁ. Iminā ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlaṁ pariyādāya dasseti. Saṁvutoti
atk-abh02a11:41_2: pihito; saṁvutindriyo pihitindriyoti attho. Yathā hi saṁvutadvāraṁ gehaṁ ‘‘saṁvutagehaṁ
atk-abh02a11:41_3: pihitageha’’nti vuccati, evamidha saṁvutindriyo ‘‘saṁvuto’’ti vutto. Pātimokkhasaṁvarenāti
atk-abh02a11:41_4: pātimokkhena ca saṁvarena ca, pātimokkhasaṅkhātena vā saṁvarena. Upetotiādīni vuttatthāneva.
atk-abh02a11:42: 512.Iriyatītiādīhi sattahipi padehi pātimokkhasaṁvarasīle ṭhitassa bhikkhuno iriyāpathavihāro kathito.
atk-abh02a11:43_0: 513. Ācāragocaraniddese kiñcāpi bhagavā samaṇācaraṁ samaṇagocaraṁ kathetukāmo ‘‘ācāragocarasampannoti
atk-abh02a11:43_1: atthi ācāro, atthi anācāro’’ti padaṁ uddhari. Yathā pana maggakusalo puriso maggaṁ
atk-abh02a11:43_2: acikkhanto ‘vāmaṁ muñca dakkhiṇaṁ gaṇhā’ti paṭhamaṁ muñcitabbaṁ sabhayamaggaṁ uppathamaggaṁ
atk-abh02a11:43_3: ācikkhati , pacchā gahetabbaṁ khemamaggaṁ ujumaggaṁ; evameva maggakusalapurisasadiso
atk-abh02a11:43_4: dhammarājā paṭhamaṁ pahātabbaṁ buddhappaṭikuṭṭhaṁ anācāraṁ ācikkhitvā pacchā ācāraṁ
atk-abh02a11:43_5: ācikkhitukāmo ‘‘tattha katamo anācāro’’tiādimāha. Purisena hi ācikkhitamaggo sampajjeyya
atk-abh02a11:43_6: vā na vā, tathāgatena ācikkhitamaggo apaṇṇako, indena vissaṭṭhaṁ vajiraṁ viya, avirajjhanako
atk-abh02a11:43_7: nibbānanagaraṁyeva samosarati. Tena vuttaṁ – ‘‘puriso maggakusaloti kho, tissa, tathāgatassetaṁ
atk-abh02a11:44_0: Yasmā vā sasīsaṁ nahānena pahīnasedamalajallikassa purisassa mālāgandhavilepanādivibhūsanavidhānaṁ
atk-abh02a11:44_1: viya pahīnapāpadhammassa kalyāṇadhammasamāyogo sampannarūpo hoti, tasmā sedamalajallikkaṁ
atk-abh02a11:44_2: viya pahātabbaṁ paṭhamaṁ anācāraṁ ācikkhitvā, pahīnasedamalajallikassa mālāgandhavilepanādivibhūsanavidhānaṁ
atk-abh02a11:44_3: viya pacchā ācāraṁ ācikkhitukāmopi tattha katamo anācārotiādimāha. Tattha kāyiko
atk-abh02a11:44_4: vītikkamoti tividhaṁ kāyaduccaritaṁ; vācasiko vītikkamoti catubbidhaṁ vacīduccaritaṁ;
atk-abh02a11:44_5: kāyikavācasiko vītikkamoti tadubhayaṁ. Evaṁ ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlasseva vītikkamaṁ dassesi.
atk-abh02a11:45_0: Yasmā pana na kevalaṁ kāyavācāhi eva anācāraṁ ācarati, manasāpi ācarati eva, tasmā
atk-abh02a11:45_1: taṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘sabbampi dussīlyaṁ anācāro’’ti vuttaṁ. Tattha ekacciyaṁ anācāraṁ vibhajitvā
atk-abh02a11:45_2: dassento idhekacco veḷudānenātiādimāha. Tattha veḷudānenāti paccayahetukena veḷudānena.
atk-abh02a11:45_3: Vihāre uṭṭhitañhi araññato vā āharitvā rakkhitagopitaṁ veḷuṁ ‘evaṁ me paccayaṁ dassantī’ti
atk-abh02a11:45_4: upaṭṭhākānaṁ dātuṁ na vaṭṭati. Evañhi jīvitaṁ kappento anesanāya micchājīvena jīvati.
atk-abh02a11:45_5: So diṭṭheva dhamme garahaṁ pāpuṇāti, samparāye ca apāyaparipūrako hoti. Attano puggalikaveḷuṁ
atk-abh02a11:45_7: dadamāno bhaṇḍagghena kāretabbo. Saṅghikepi eseva nayo. Sace pana taṁ issaravatāya
atk-abh02a11:46_0: Kataro pana veḷu garubhaṇḍaṁ hoti, kataro na hotīti? Yo tāva aropimo sayaṁjātako,
atk-abh02a11:46_1: so saṅghena paricchinnaṭṭhāneyeva garubhaṇḍaṁ, tato paraṁ na garubhaṇḍaṁ; ropitaṭṭhāne
atk-abh02a11:46_2: sabbena sabbaṁ garubhaṇḍaṁ. So pana pamāṇena paricchinno telanāḷippamāṇopi garubhaṇḍaṁ,
atk-abh02a11:46_3: na tato heṭṭhā. Yassa pana bhikkhuno telanāḷiyā vā kattaradaṇḍena vā attho, tena
atk-abh02a11:46_4: phātikammaṁ katvā gahetabbo. Phātikammaṁ tadagghanakaṁ vā atirekaṁ vā vaṭṭati, ūnakaṁ
atk-abh02a11:46_5: na vaṭṭati. Hatthakammampi udakāharaṇamattaṁ vā appaharitakaraṇamattaṁ vā na vaṭṭati,
atk-abh02a11:46_6: taṁ thāvaraṁ kātuṁ vaṭṭati. Tasmā pokkharaṇito vā paṁsuṁ uddharitvā sopānaṁ vā attharāpetvā
atk-abh02a11:46_7: visamaṭṭhānaṁ vā samaṁ katvā gahetuṁ vaṭṭati. Phātikammaṁ akatvā gahito tattha vasanteneva
atk-abh02a11:46_8: paribhuñjitabbo; pakkamantena saṅghikaṁ katvā ṭhapetvā gantabbaṁ. Asatiyā gahetvā
atk-abh02a11:46_9: gatena yattha gato sarati, tato paccāharitabbo. Sace antarā bhayaṁ hoti, sampattavihare ṭhapetvā gantabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:47_0: Manussā vihāraṁ gantvā veḷuṁ yācanti. Bhikkhū ‘saṅghiko’ti dātuṁ na visahanti. Manussā
atk-abh02a11:47_1: punappunaṁ yācanti vā tajjenti vā. Tadā bhikkhūhi ‘daṇḍakammaṁ katvā gaṇhathā’ti
atk-abh02a11:47_2: vattuṁ vaṭṭati; veḷudānaṁ nāma na hoti. Sace te daṇḍakammatthāya vāsipharasuādīni
atk-abh02a11:47_3: vā khādanīyabhojanīyaṁ vā denti, gahetuṁ na vaṭṭati. Vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana ‘‘daḍḍhagehā
atk-abh02a11:47_4: manussā gaṇhitvā gacchantā na vāretabbā’’ti vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:48_0: Sace saṅghassa veḷugumbe veḷudūsikā uppajjanti, taṁ akoṭṭāpentānaṁ veḷu nassati,
atk-abh02a11:48_1: kiṁ kātabbanti? Bhikkhācāre manussānaṁ ācikkhitabbaṁ. Sace koṭṭetuṁ na icchanti ‘samabhāgaṁ
atk-abh02a11:48_2: labhissathā’ti vattabbā; na icchantiyeva ‘dve koṭṭhāse labhissathā’ti vattabbā. Evampi
atk-abh02a11:48_3: anicchantesu ‘naṭṭhena attho natthi, tumhākaṁ khaṇe sati daṇḍakammaṁ karissatha,
atk-abh02a11:48_4: koṭṭetvā gaṇhathā’ti vattabbā; veḷudānaṁ nāma na hoti. Veḷugumbe aggimhi uṭṭhitepi,
atk-abh02a11:48_5: udakena vuyhamānaveḷūsupi eseva nayo. Rukkhesupi ayameva kathāmaggo. Rukkho pana
atk-abh02a11:48_6: sūcidaṇḍakappamāṇo garubhaṇḍaṁ hoti. Saṅghike rukkhe koṭṭāpetvā saṅghaṁ anāpucchitvāpi
atk-abh02a11:48_7: saṅghikaṁ āvāsaṁ kātuṁ labbhati. Vacanapathacchedanatthaṁ pana āpucchitvāva kātabbo.
atk-abh02a11:49_0: Puggalikaṁ kātuṁ labbhati, na labbhatīti? Na labbhati. Hatthakammasīsena pana ekasmiṁ
atk-abh02a11:49_1: gehe mañcaṭṭhānamattaṁ labbhati, tīsu gehesu ekaṁ gehaṁ labhati. Sace dabbhasambhārā
atk-abh02a11:49_2: puggalikā honti, bhūmi saṅghikā, ekaṁ gehaṁ katvā samabhāgaṁ labhati, dvīsu gehesu
atk-abh02a11:49_3: ekaṁ gehaṁ labhati. Saṅghikarukkhe saṅghikaṁ āvāsaṁ bādhente saṅghaṁ anāpucchā hāretuṁ
atk-abh02a11:49_4: vaṭṭati, na vaṭṭatīti? Vaṭṭati. Vacanapathacchedanatthaṁ pana āpucchitvāva hāretabbo.
atk-abh02a11:49_5: Sace rukkhaṁ nissāya saṅghassa mahanto lābho hoti, na hāretabbo. Puggalikarukkhe
atk-abh02a11:49_6: saṅghikaṁ āvāsaṁ bādhente rukkhasāmikassa ācikkhitabbaṁ. Sace harituṁ na icchati,
atk-abh02a11:49_7: chedāpetvā hāretabbo. ‘Rukkhaṁ me dethā’ti codentassa rukkhaṁ agghāpetvā mūlaṁ dātabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:49_8: Saṅghike rukkhe puggalikāvāsaṁ, puggalike ca puggalikāvāsaṁ bādhentepi eseva nayo.
atk-abh02a11:49_9: Valliyampi ayameva kathāmaggo. Valli pana yattha vikkāyati, dullabhā hoti, tattha
atk-abh02a11:49_10: garubhaṇḍaṁ. Sā ca kho upaḍḍhabāhuppamāṇato paṭṭhāya; tato heṭṭhā vallikhaṇḍaṁ garubhaṇḍaṁ na hoti.
atk-abh02a11:50_0: Pattadānādīsupi pattadānenāti paccayahetukena pattadānenātiādi sabbaṁ veḷudāne vuttanayeneva
atk-abh02a11:50_1: veditabbaṁ. Garubhaṇḍatāya panettha ayaṁ vinicchayo. Pattampi hi yattha vikkāyati,
atk-abh02a11:50_2: gandhikādayo gandhapaliveṭhanādīnaṁ atthāya gaṇhanti, tādise dullabhaṭṭhāneyeva garubhaṇḍaṁ
atk-abh02a11:51_0: Tālapaṇṇampi imasmiṁyeva ṭhāne kathetabbaṁ. Tālapaṇṇampi hi sayaṁjāte tālavane saṅghena
atk-abh02a11:51_1: paricchinnaṭṭhāneyeva garubhaṇḍaṁ, na tato paraṁ. Ropimatālesu sabbampi garubhaṇḍaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:51_2: Tassa pamāṇaṁ heṭṭhimakoṭiyā aṭṭhaṅgulappamāṇopi rittapotthako. Tiṇampi ettheva pakkhipitvā
atk-abh02a11:51_3: kathetabbaṁ. Yattha pana tiṇaṁ natthi tattha muñjapalālanāḷikerapaṇṇādīhipi chādenti.
atk-abh02a11:51_4: Tasmā tānipi tiṇeneva saṅgahitāni. Iti muñjapalālādīsu yaṁkiñci muṭṭhippamāṇaṁ tiṇaṁ,
atk-abh02a11:51_5: nāḷikerapaṇṇādīsu ca ekapaṇṇampi saṅghassa dinnaṁ vā tatthajātakaṁ vā bahiārāme saṅghassa
atk-abh02a11:51_6: tiṇavatthumhi jātatiṇaṁ vā rakkhitagopitaṁ garubhaṇḍaṁ hoti. Taṁ pana saṅghakamme
atk-abh02a11:51_7: ca cetiyakamme ca kate atirekaṁ puggalikakamme dātuṁ vaṭṭati. Heṭṭhā vuttaveḷumhipi eseva nayo.
atk-abh02a11:52_0: Pupphadāne ‘‘ettakesu rukkhesu pupphāni vissajjetvā yāgubhattavatthe upanentu, ettakesu
atk-abh02a11:52_1: senāsanapaṭisaṅkharaṇe upanentū’’ti evaṁ niyamitaṭṭhāne eva pupphāni garubhaṇḍāni
atk-abh02a11:52_2: honti. Paratīre sāmaṇerā pupphāni ocinitvā rāsiṁ karonti, pañcaṅgasamannāgato pupphabhājako
atk-abh02a11:52_3: bhikkhusaṅghaṁ gaṇetvā koṭṭhāse karoti, so sampattaparisāya saṅghaṁ anāpucchitvāva
atk-abh02a11:52_4: dātuṁ labhati; asammatena pana āpucchitvāva dātabbaṁ. Bhikkhu pana kassa pupphāni
atk-abh02a11:52_5: dātuṁ labhati, kassa na labhatīti? Mātāpitūnaṁ gehaṁ haritvāpi gehato pakkosāpetvāpi
atk-abh02a11:52_6: ‘vatthupūjaṁ karothā’ti dātuṁ labhati, piḷandhanatthāya dātuṁ na labhati; sesañātīnaṁ
atk-abh02a11:52_7: pana haritvā na dātabbaṁ, pakkosāpetvā ‘pūjaṁ karothā’ti dātabbaṁ; sesajanassa pūjanaṭṭhānaṁ
atk-abh02a11:52_8: sampattassa apaccāsīsantena dātabbaṁ; pupphadānaṁ nāma na hoti. Vihāre bahūni pupphāni
atk-abh02a11:52_9: pupphanti. Bhikkhunā piṇḍāya carantena manusse disvā ‘vihāre bahūni pupphāni, pūjethā’ti
atk-abh02a11:52_10: vattabbaṁ. Vacanamatte doso natthi. ‘Manussā khādanīyabhojanīyaṁ ādāya āgamissantī’ti
atk-abh02a11:52_11: cittena pana na vattabbaṁ. Sace vadati, khādanīyabhojanīyaṁ na paribhuñjitabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:52_12: Manussā attano dhammatāya ‘vihāre pupphāni atthī’ti pucchitvā ‘asukadivase vihāraṁ
atk-abh02a11:52_13: āgamissāma, sāmaṇerānaṁ pupphāni ocinituṁ mā dethā’ti vadanti. Bhikkhū sāmaṇerānaṁ
atk-abh02a11:52_14: kathetuṁ pamuṭṭhā. Sāmaṇerehi pupphāni ocinitvā ṭhapitāni. Manussā bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā
atk-abh02a11:52_15: ‘‘bhante, mayaṁ tumhākaṁ asukadivaseyeva ārocayimha – ‘sāmaṇerānaṁ pupphāni ocinituṁ
atk-abh02a11:52_16: mā dethā’ti. Kasmā na vārayitthā’’ti? ‘‘Sati me pamuṭṭhā, pupphāni ocinitamattāneva,
atk-abh02a11:52_17: tāva na pūjā katā’’ti vattabbaṁ. ‘‘Gaṇhatha pūjethā’’ti na vattabbaṁ. Sace vadati,
atk-abh02a11:53_0: Aparo bhikkhu sāmaṇerānaṁ ācikkhati ‘‘asukagāmavāsino pupphāni mā ocinitthā’’ti āhaṁsūti.
atk-abh02a11:53_1: Manussāpi āmisaṁ āharitvā dānaṁ datvā vadanti – ‘‘amhākaṁ manussā na bahukā, sāmaṇere
atk-abh02a11:53_2: amhehi saha pupphāni ocinituṁ āṇāpethā’’ti. ‘‘Sāmaṇerehi bhikkhā laddhā; ye bhikkhācāraṁ
atk-abh02a11:53_3: na gacchanti, te sayameva jānissanti, upāsakā’’ti vattabbaṁ. Ettakaṁ nayaṁ labhitvā
atk-abh02a11:53_4: sāmaṇere putte vā bhātike vā katvā pupphāni ocināpetuṁ doso natthi; pupphadānaṁ nāma na hoti.
atk-abh02a11:54_0: Phaladāne phalampi pupphaṁ viya niyamitameva garubhaṇḍaṁ hoti. Vihāre bahukamhi phalāphale
atk-abh02a11:54_1: sati aphāsukamanussā āgantvā yācanti. Bhikkhū ‘saṅghika’nti dātuṁ na ussahanti. Manussā
atk-abh02a11:54_2: vippaṭisārino akkosanti paribhāsanti. Tattha kiṁ kātabbanti? Phalehi vā rukkhehi
atk-abh02a11:54_3: vā paricchinditvā katikā kātabbā – ‘asukesu ca rukkhesu ettakāni phalāni gaṇhantā,
atk-abh02a11:54_4: ettakesu vā rukkhesu phalāni gaṇhantā na vāretabbā’ti. Corā pana issarā vā balakkārena
atk-abh02a11:54_5: gaṇhantā na vāretabbā; kuddhā te sakalavihārampi nāseyyuṁ. Ādīnavo pana kathetabboti.
atk-abh02a11:55_0: Sinānadāne sinānacuṇṇāni koṭṭitāni na garubhaṇḍāni. Akoṭṭito rukkhattacova garubhaṇḍaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:55_1: Cuṇṇaṁ pana agilānassa rajananipakkaṁ vaṭṭati. Gilānassa yaṁkiñci cuṇṇaṁ vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-abh02a11:55_2: Mattikāpi ettheva pakkhipitvā kathetabbā. Mattikāpi yattha dullabhā hoti, tattheva
atk-abh02a11:55_3: garubhaṇḍaṁ. Sāpi heṭṭhimakoṭiyā tiṁsapalaguḷapiṇḍappamāṇāva tato heṭṭhā na garubhaṇḍanti.
atk-abh02a11:56_0: Dantakaṭṭhadāne dantakaṭṭhaṁ acchinnakameva garubhaṇḍaṁ. Yesaṁ sāmaṇerānaṁ saṅghato
atk-abh02a11:56_1: dantakaṭṭhavāro pāpuṇāti, te attano ācariyupajjhāyānaṁ pāṭiyekkaṁ dātuṁ na labhanti.
atk-abh02a11:56_2: Yehi pana ‘ettakāni dantakaṭṭhāni āharitabbānī’ti paricchinditvā vāraṁ gahitāni,
atk-abh02a11:56_3: te atirekāni ācariyupajjhāyānaṁ dātuṁ labhanti. Ekena bhikkhunā dantakaṭṭhamāḷakato
atk-abh02a11:56_4: bahūni dantakaṭṭhāni na gahetabbāni, devasikaṁ ekekameva gahetabbaṁ. Pāṭiyekkaṁ vasantenāpi
atk-abh02a11:56_5: bhikkhusaṅghaṁ gaṇayitvā yattakāni attano pāpuṇanti tattakāneva gahetvā gantabbaṁ;
atk-abh02a11:56_6: antarā āgantukesu vā āgatesu disaṁ vā pakkamantena āharitvā gahitaṭṭhāneyeva ṭhapetabbāni.
atk-abh02a11:57_0: Cāṭukamyatāyātiādīsu cāṭukamyatā vuccati attānaṁ dāsaṁ viya nīcaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā parassa
atk-abh02a11:57_1: khalitavacanampi saṇṭhapetvā piyakāmatāya paggayhavacanaṁ. Muggasūpyatāyāti muggasūpasamānāya
atk-abh02a11:57_2: saccālikena jīvitakappanatāyetaṁ adhivacanaṁ. Yathā hi muggasūpe paccante bahū muggā
atk-abh02a11:57_3: pākaṁ gacchanti, thokā na gacchanti; evameva saccālikena jīvitakappake puggale bahu
atk-abh02a11:57_4: alikaṁ hoti, appakaṁ saccaṁ. Yathā vā muggasūpassa appavisanaṭṭhānaṁ nāma natthi,
atk-abh02a11:57_5: evameva saccālikavuttino puggalassa appaviṭṭhavācā nāma natthi; siṅghāṭakaṁ viya
atk-abh02a11:57_6: icchiticchitadhārāya patiṭṭhāti. Tenassa sā musāvāditā muggasūpyatāti vuttā. Pāribhaṭayatāti
atk-abh02a11:57_7: paribhaṭakammabhāvo. Paribhaṭassa hi kammaṁ pāribhaṭayaṁ, tassa bhāvo pāribhaṭayatā;
atk-abh02a11:58_0: Jaṅghapesanikanti gāmantaradesantarādīsu tesaṁ tesaṁ gihīnaṁ sāsanapaṭisāsanaharaṇaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:58_1: Idañhi jaṅghapesanikaṁ nāma attano mātāpitūnaṁ, ye cassa mātāpitaro upaṭṭhahanti,
atk-abh02a11:58_2: tesaṁ sāsanaṁ gahetvā katthaci gamanavasena vaṭṭati. Cetiyassa vā saṅghassa vā attano
atk-abh02a11:58_3: vā kammaṁ karontānaṁ vaḍḍhakīnampi sāsanaṁ harituṁ vaṭṭati. Manussā ‘‘dānaṁ dassāma,
atk-abh02a11:58_4: pūjaṁ karissāma, bhikkhusaṅghassa ācikkhathā’’ti vadanti; ‘‘asukattherassa nāma dethā’’ti
atk-abh02a11:58_5: piṇḍapātaṁ vā bhesajjaṁ vā cīvaraṁ vā denti; ‘‘vihāre pūjaṁ karothā’’ti mālāgandhavilepanādīni
atk-abh02a11:58_6: vā dhajapatākādīni vā nīyyādenti, sabbaṁ harituṁ vaṭṭati; jaṅghapesanikaṁ nāma na
atk-abh02a11:58_7: hoti. Sesānaṁ sāsanaṁ gahetvā gacchantassa padavāre padavāre doso.
atk-abh02a11:59_0: Aññataraññatarenāti etesaṁ vā veḷudānādīnaṁ aññataraññatarena vejjakammabhaṇḍāgārikakammaṁ
atk-abh02a11:59_2: jīvitakappanakakammānaṁ yena kenaci. Buddhapaṭikuṭṭhenāti buddhehi garahitena paṭisiddhena.
atk-abh02a11:59_3: Ayaṁ vuccatīti ayaṁ sabbopi anācāro nāma kathīyati. Ācāraniddeso vuttapaṭipakkhanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-abh02a11:60_0: 514. Gocaraniddesepi paṭhamaṁ agocarassa vacane kāraṇaṁ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:60_1: Tattha ca gocaroti piṇḍapātādīnaṁ atthāya upasaṅkamituṁ yuttaṭṭhānaṁ gocaro, ayuttaṭṭhānaṁ
atk-abh02a11:60_2: agocaro. Vesiyā gocaro assāti vesiyagocaro; mittasanthavavasena upasaṅkamitaṭṭhānanti
atk-abh02a11:60_3: attho. Tattha vesiyā nāma rūpūpajīviniyo yena kenacideva sulabhajjhācāratāmittasatthavasinehavasena
atk-abh02a11:60_4: upasaṅkamanto vesiyāgocaro nāma hoti. Tasmā evaṁ upasaṅkamituṁ na vaṭṭati. Kiṁ kāraṇā?
atk-abh02a11:60_5: Ārakkhavipattito. Evaṁ upasaṅkamantassa hi ciraṁ rakkhitagopitopi samaṇadhammo katipāheneva
atk-abh02a11:60_6: nassati; sacepi na nassati garahaṁ labhati. Dakkhiṇāvasena pana upasaṅkamantena satiṁ
atk-abh02a11:60_7: upaṭṭhāpetvā upasaṅkamitabbaṁ. Vidhavā vuccanti matapatikā vā pavutthapatikā vā.
atk-abh02a11:60_9: ussannakilesā avūpasantapariḷāhā napuṁsakā. Tesaṁ sabbesampi upasaṅkamane ādīnavo
atk-abh02a11:60_10: vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Bhikkhunīsupi eseva nayo. Apica bhikkhū nāma ussannabrahmacariyā
atk-abh02a11:60_11: honti, tathā bhikkhuniyo. Te aññamaññaṁ santhavavasena katipāheneva rakkhitagopitasamaṇadhammaṁ
atk-abh02a11:60_12: nāsenti. Gilānapucchakena pana gantuṁ vaṭṭati. Bhikkhunā pupphāni labhitvā pūjanatthāyapi
atk-abh02a11:61_0: Pānāgāranti surāpānagharaṁ. Taṁ brahmacariyantarāyakarehi surāsoṇḍehi avivittaṁ hoti.
atk-abh02a11:61_1: Tattha tehi saddhiṁ saha soṇḍavasena upasaṅkamituṁ na vaṭṭati; brahmacariyantarāyo
atk-abh02a11:61_2: hoti. Saṁsaṭṭho viharati rājūhītiādīsu rājānoti abhisittā vā hontu anabhisittā vā
atk-abh02a11:61_3: ye rajjaṁ anusāsanti. Rājamahāmattāti rājūnaṁ issariyasadisāya mahatiyā issariyamattāya
atk-abh02a11:61_4: samannāgatā. Titthiyāti viparītadassanā bāhiraparibbājakā. Titthiyasāvakāti bhattivasena
atk-abh02a11:61_5: tesaṁ paccayadāyakā. Etehi saddhiṁ saṁsaggajāto hotīti attho.
atk-abh02a11:62_0: Ananulomikena saṁsaggenāti ananulomikasaṁsaggo nāma tissannaṁ sikkhānaṁ ananulomo
atk-abh02a11:62_2: pāpuṇāti, seyyathidaṁ – rājarājamahāmattehi saddhiṁ sahasokitā, sahananditā, samasukhadukkhatā,
atk-abh02a11:62_3: uppannesu kiccakaraṇīyesu attanāva yogaṁ āpajjanatā, titthiyatitthiyasāvakehi saddhiṁ
atk-abh02a11:62_5: Tattha rājarājamahāmattehi saddhiṁ saṁsaggo brahmacariyantarāyaṁ karoti. Itarehi
atk-abh02a11:62_6: titthiyasāvakehi tesaṁ laddhigahaṇaṁ. Tesaṁ pana vādaṁ bhinditvā attano laddhiṁ gaṇhāpetuṁ
atk-abh02a11:63_0: Idāni aparenapi pariyāyena agocaraṁ dassetuṁ yāni vā pana tāni kulānītiādi āraddhaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:63_1: Tattha assaddhānīti buddhādīsu saddhāvirahitāni; buddho sabbaññū, dhammo niyyāniko,
atk-abh02a11:63_2: saṅgho suppaṭipannoti na saddahanti. Appasannānīti cittaṁ pasannaṁ anāvilaṁ kātuṁ
atk-abh02a11:63_3: na sakkonti. Akkosakaparibhāsakānīti akkosakāni ceva paribhāsakāni ca; ‘corosi, bālosi,
atk-abh02a11:63_4: mūḷhosi, oṭṭhosi, goṇosi, gadrabhosi, āpāyikosi, nerayikosi, tiracchānagatosi, natthi
atk-abh02a11:63_5: tuyhaṁ sugati, duggatiyeva pāṭikaṅkhā’ti evaṁ dasahi akkosavatthūhi akkosanti; ‘hotu,
atk-abh02a11:63_6: idāni taṁ paharissāma, bandhissāma , vadhissāmā’ti evaṁ bhayadassanena paribhāsanti
atk-abh02a11:63_7: cāti attho. Anatthakāmānīti atthaṁ na icchanti, anatthameva icchanti. Ahitakāmānīti
atk-abh02a11:63_8: ahitameva icchanti, hitaṁ na icchanti. Aphāsukakāmānīti phāsukaṁ na icchanti, aphāsukameva
atk-abh02a11:63_9: icchanti. Ayogakkhemakāmānīti catūhi yogehi khemaṁ nibbhayaṁ na icchanti, sabhayameva
atk-abh02a11:63_10: icchanti. Bhikkhūnanti ettha sāmaṇerāpi saṅgahaṁ gacchanti. Bhikkhunīnanti ettha
atk-abh02a11:63_11: sikkhamānasāmaṇeriyopi. Sabbesampi hi bhagavantaṁ uddissa pabbajitānañceva saraṇagatānañca
atk-abh02a11:63_12: catunnampi parisānaṁ tāni anatthakāmāniyeva. Tathārūpāni kulānīti evarūpāni khattiyakulādīni
atk-abh02a11:63_13: kulāni. Sevatīti nissāya jīvati. Bhajatīti upasaṅkamati. Payirupāsatīti punappunaṁ
atk-abh02a11:63_14: upasaṅkamati. Ayaṁ vuccatīti ayaṁ vesiyādigocarassa vesiyādiko, rājādisaṁsaṭṭhassa
atk-abh02a11:63_15: rājādiko, assaddhakulādisevakassa assaddhakulādiko cāti tippakāropi ayuttagocaro
atk-abh02a11:64_0: Tassa iminā pariyāyena agocaratā veditabbā. Vesiyādiko tāva pañcakāmaguṇanissayato
atk-abh02a11:64_1: agocaroti veditabbo, yathāha – ‘‘ko ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno agocaro paravisayo?
atk-abh02a11:64_2: Yadidaṁ pañca kāmaguṇā’’ti (saṁ. ni. 5.372) rājādiko jhānānuyogassa anupanissayato
atk-abh02a11:64_3: lābhasakkārāsanicakkanipphādanato diṭṭhivipattihetuto ca, assaddhakulādiko saddhāhānicittasantāsāvahanato agocaroti.
atk-abh02a11:65_0: Gocaraniddese na vesiyagocarotiādīni vuttapaṭipakkhavasena veditabbāni. Opānabhūtānītiādīsu
atk-abh02a11:65_1: pana opānabhūtānīti udapānabhūtāni; bhikkhusaṅghassa, cātumahāpathe khatapokkharaṇī
atk-abh02a11:65_2: viya, yathāsukhaṁ ogāhanakkhamāni cittamahāmattassa gehasadisāni. Tassa kira gehe
atk-abh02a11:65_3: kālatthambho yuttoyeva . Gharadvāraṁ sampattānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ paccayavekallaṁ nāma
atk-abh02a11:65_4: natthi. Ekadivasaṁ bhesajjavattameva saṭṭhi kahāpaṇāni nikkhamanti. Kāsāvapajjotānīti
atk-abh02a11:65_5: bhikkhubhikkhunīhi nivatthapārutānaṁ kāsāvānaṁyeva pabhāya ekobhāsāni bhūtapālaseṭṭhikulasadisāni.
atk-abh02a11:65_7: isīnaṁ cīvaravātena ceva samiñjanapasāraṇādijanitasarīravātena ca paṭivātāni pavāyitāni
atk-abh02a11:66_0: 515.Aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvitāniddese aṇumattānīti aṇuppamāṇā. Vajjāti dosā.
atk-abh02a11:66_1: Yāni tāni vajjānīti yāni tāni garahitabbaṭṭhena vajjāni. Appamattakānīti parittamattakāni
atk-abh02a11:66_2: khuddakappamāṇāni. Oramattakānīti parittatopi orimappamāṇattā oramattakāni. Lahusānīti
atk-abh02a11:66_3: lahukāni. Lahusammatānīti lahūti sammatāni. Saṁyamakaraṇīyānīti saṁyamena kattabbapaṭikammāni.
atk-abh02a11:66_4: Saṁvarakaraṇīyānīti saṁvarena kātabbāni saṁvarena kattabbapaṭikammāni. Cittuppādakaraṇīyānīti
atk-abh02a11:66_6: kattabbapaṭikammāni. Kāni pana tānīti? Divāvihāravāsī sumatthero tāva āha – ‘‘anāpattigamanīyāni
atk-abh02a11:66_7: cittuppādamattakāni yāni ‘na puna evarūpaṁ karissāmī’ti manasā āvajjitamatteneva
atk-abh02a11:66_8: sujjhanti. Adhiṭṭhānāvikammaṁ nāmetaṁ kathita’’nti. Antevāsiko panassa tipiṭakacūḷanāgatthero
atk-abh02a11:66_9: panāha – ‘‘idaṁ pātimokkhasaṁvarasīlasseva bhājanīyaṁ. Tasmā sabbalahukaṁ dukkaṭadubbhāsitaṁ
atk-abh02a11:66_10: idha vajjanti veditabbaṁ. Vuṭṭhānāvikammaṁ nāmetaṁ kathita’’nti. Itiimesūti evaṁpakāresu
atk-abh02a11:66_11: imesu. Vajjadassāvīti vajjato dosato dassanasīlo. Bhayadassāvīti catubbidhassa bhayassa
atk-abh02a11:66_12: kāraṇattā bhayato dassanasīlo. Ādīnavadassāvīti idha nindāvahanato, āyatiṁ dukkhavipākato,
atk-abh02a11:66_13: upariguṇānaṁ antarāyakaraṇato, vippaṭisārajananato ca etena nānappakārena ādīnavato dassanasīlo.
atk-abh02a11:67_0: Nissaraṇadassāvīti yaṁ tattha nissaraṇaṁ tassa dassanasīlo. Kiṁ panettha nissaraṇanti?
atk-abh02a11:67_2: kathitaṁ. Antevāsikattheravāde tāva ‘‘āpattigamanīyatāya sati vuṭṭhānāvikammaṁ nissaraṇa’’nti kathitaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:68_0: Tattha tathārūpo bhikkhu aṇumattāni vajjāni vajjato bhayato passati nāma. Taṁ dassetuṁ
atk-abh02a11:68_1: ayaṁ nayo kathito – paramāṇu nāma, aṇu nāma, tajjārī nāma, rathareṇu nāma, likkhā
atk-abh02a11:68_2: nāma, ūkā nāma, dhaññamāso nāma, aṅgulaṁ nāma, vidatthi nāma, ratanaṁ nāma, yaṭṭhi
atk-abh02a11:68_3: nāma, usabhaṁ nāma, gāvutaṁ nāma, yojanaṁ nāma. Tattha ‘paramāṇu’ nāma ākāsakoṭṭhāsiko
atk-abh02a11:68_4: maṁsacakkhussa āpāthaṁ nāgacchati, dibbacakkhusseva āgacchati. ‘Aṇu’ nāma bhitticchiddatālacchiddehi
atk-abh02a11:68_5: paviṭṭhasūriyarasmīsu vaṭṭi vaṭṭi hutvā paribbhamanto paññāyati. ‘Tajjārī’ nāma gopathamanussapathacakkapathesu
atk-abh02a11:68_6: chijjitvā ubhosu passesu uggantvā tiṭṭhati. ‘Rathareṇu’ nāma tattha tattheva allīyati.
atk-abh02a11:68_7: Likkhādayo pākaṭā eva. Etesu pana chattiṁsa paramāṇavo ekassa aṇuno pamāṇaṁ. Chattiṁsa
atk-abh02a11:68_8: aṇū ekāya tajjāriyā pamāṇaṁ. Chattiṁsa tajjāriyo eko rathareṇu. Chattiṁsa rathareṇū
atk-abh02a11:68_9: ekā likkhā. Satta likkhā ekā ūkā. Satta ūkā eko dhaññamāso. Sattadhaññamāsappamāṇaṁ
atk-abh02a11:68_10: ekaṁ aṅgulaṁ. Tenaṅgulena dvādasaṅgulāni vidatthi. Dve vidatthiyo ratanaṁ. Satta
atk-abh02a11:68_11: ratanāni yaṭṭhi. Tāya yaṭṭhiyā vīsati yaṭṭhiyo usabhaṁ. Asīti usabhāni gāvutaṁ. Cattāri
atk-abh02a11:68_12: gāvutāni yojanaṁ. Tena yojanena aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyojanasatasahassubbedho sinerupabbatarājā.
atk-abh02a11:68_14: katvā daṭṭhuṁ sakkoti – ayaṁ bhikkhu aṇumattāni vajjāni bhayato passati nāma. Yopi
atk-abh02a11:68_15: bhikkhu sabbalahukaṁ dukkaṭadubbhāsitamattaṁ paṭhamapārājikasadisaṁ katvā daṭṭhuṁ
atk-abh02a11:68_16: sakkoti – ayaṁ aṇumattāni vajjāni vajjato bhayato passati nāmāti veditabbo.
atk-abh02a11:69_1: Sā bhikkhunīhi sādhāraṇāpi asādhāraṇāpi bhikkhusikkhā eva nāma. Bhikkhunīsikkhāti
atk-abh02a11:69_2: bhikkhunīhi sikkhitabbasikkhā. Sāpi bhikkhūhi sādhāraṇāpi asādhāraṇāpi bhikkhunīsikkhā
atk-abh02a11:69_3: eva nāma. Sāmaṇerasikkhamānasāmaṇerīnaṁ sikkhāpi ettheva paviṭṭhā. Upāsakasikkhāti
atk-abh02a11:69_4: upāsakehi sikkhitabbasikkhā. Sā pañcasīladasasīlavasena vaṭṭati. Upāsikāsikkhāti
atk-abh02a11:69_5: upāsikāhi sikkhitabbasikkhā. Sāpi pañcasīladasasīlavasena vaṭṭati. Tattha bhikkhubhikkhunīnaṁ
atk-abh02a11:69_6: sikkhā yāva arahattamaggā vaṭṭati. Upāsakaupāsikānaṁ sikkhā yāva anāgāmimaggā. Tatrāyaṁ
atk-abh02a11:69_7: bhikkhu attanā sikkhitabbasikkhāpadesu eva sikkhati. Sesasikkhā pana atthuddhāravasena
atk-abh02a11:69_8: sikkhāpadassa atthadassa dassanatthaṁ vuttā. Iti imāsu sikkhāsūti evaṁpakārāsu etāsu
atk-abh02a11:69_9: sikkhāsu. Sabbena sabbanti sabbena sikkhāsamādānena sabbaṁ sikkhaṁ. Sabbathā sabbanti
atk-abh02a11:69_10: sabbena sikkhitabbākārena sabbaṁ sikkhaṁ. Asesaṁ nissesanti sesābhāvato asesaṁ; satisammosena
atk-abh02a11:69_11: bhinnassāpi sikkhāpadassa puna pākatikakaraṇato nissesaṁ. Samādāya vattatīti samādiyitvā
atk-abh02a11:69_12: gahetvā vattati. Tena vuccatīti yena kāraṇena etaṁ sabbaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ sabbena sikkhitabbākārena
atk-abh02a11:69_13: samādiyitvā sikkhati pūreti, tena vuccati ‘‘samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesū’’ti.
atk-abh02a11:70_1: paṭhamavacane payojanaṁ ācāraniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ. Tattha katamā indriyesu
atk-abh02a11:70_2: aguttadvāratātiādīsu pana yaṁ vattabbaṁ, taṁ sabbaṁ nikkhepakaṇḍavaṇṇanāyaṁ vuttameva.
atk-abh02a11:71_1: pubbe pubbarattaṁ; iminā paṭhamayāmañceva pacchābhattañca gaṇhāti . Rattiyā pacchā
atk-abh02a11:71_2: apararattaṁ; iminā pacchimayāmañceva purebhattañca gaṇhāti. Majjhimayāmo panassa
atk-abh02a11:71_3: bhikkhuno niddākilamathavinodanokāsoti na gahito. Jāgariyānuyoganti jāgariyassa asupanabhāvassa
atk-abh02a11:71_4: anuyogaṁ. Anuyutto hotīti taṁ anuyogasaṅkhātaṁ āsevanaṁ bhāvanaṁ anuyutto hoti sampayutto.
atk-abh02a11:71_5: Niddese panassa idha bhikkhu divasanti pubbaṇho, majjhanho, sāyanhoti tayopi divasakoṭṭhāsā
atk-abh02a11:71_6: gahitā. Caṅkamena nisajjāyāti sakalampi divasaṁ iminā iriyāpathadvayeneva viharanto.
atk-abh02a11:71_7: Cittassa āvaraṇato āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi pañcahipi nīvaraṇehi sabbākusaladhammehi
atk-abh02a11:71_8: vā cittaṁ parisodheti. Tehi dhammehi visodheti parimoceti. Ṭhānaṁ panettha kiñcāpi
atk-abh02a11:71_9: na gahitaṁ, caṅkamanisajjāsannissitaṁ pana katvā gahetabbameva. Paṭhamayāmanti sakalasmimpi
atk-abh02a11:72_0: Sīhaseyyanti ettha kāmabhogīseyyā, petaseyyā, sīhaseyyā, tathāgataseyyāti catasso
atk-abh02a11:72_1: seyyā. Tattha ‘‘yebhuyyena, bhikkhave, kāmabhogī vāmena passena sentī’’ti ayaṁ kāmabhogīseyyā.
atk-abh02a11:72_2: Tesu hi yebhuyyena dakkhiṇapassena sayāno nāma natthi. ‘‘Yebhuyyena, bhikkhave ,
atk-abh02a11:72_3: petā uttānā sentī’’ti ayaṁ petaseyyā; appamaṁsalohitattā hi aṭṭhisaṅghāṭajaṭitā ekena
atk-abh02a11:72_4: passena sayituṁ na sakkonti, uttānāva senti. Sīho, bhikkhave, migarājā dakkhiṇena
atk-abh02a11:72_5: passena seyyaṁ kappeti…pe… attamano hotī’’ti (a. ni. 4.246) ayaṁ sīhaseyyā; tejussadattā
atk-abh02a11:72_6: hi sīho migarājā dve purimapāde ekasmiṁ ṭhāne dve pacchimapāde ekasmiṁ ṭhāne ṭhapetvā
atk-abh02a11:72_8: sallakkhetvā dvinnaṁ purimapādānaṁ matthake sīsaṁ ṭhapetvā sayati; divasampi sayitvā
atk-abh02a11:72_9: pabujjhamāno na uttasanto pabujjhati, sīsaṁ pana ukkhipitvā purimapādādīnaṁ ṭhitokāsaṁ
atk-abh02a11:72_10: sallakkheti; sace kiñci ṭhānaṁ vijahitvā ṭhitaṁ hoti ‘nayidaṁ tuyhaṁ jātiyā na sūrabhāvassa
atk-abh02a11:72_11: anurūpa’nti anattamano hutvā tattheva sayati, na gocarāya pakkamati; avijahitvā ṭhite
atk-abh02a11:72_12: pana ‘tuyhaṁ jātiyā ca sūrabhāvassa ca anurūpamida’nti haṭṭhatuṭṭho uṭṭhāya sīhavijambhitaṁ
atk-abh02a11:72_13: vijambhitvā kesarabhāraṁ vidhunitvā tikkhattuṁ sīhanādaṁ naditvā gocarāya pakkamati.
atk-abh02a11:72_14: Catutthajjhānaseyyā pana tathāgataseyyāti vuccati. Tāsu idha sīhaseyyā āgatā. Ayañhi
atk-abh02a11:73_0: Pāde pādanti dakkhiṇapāde vāmapādaṁ. Accādhāyāti atiādhāya īsakaṁ atikkamma ṭhapetvā
atk-abh02a11:73_1: gopphakena hi gopphake jāṇunā vā jāṇumhi saṅghaṭṭiyamāne abhiṇhaṁ vedanā uppajjati,
atk-abh02a11:73_2: cittaṁ ekaggaṁ na hoti, seyyā aphāsukā hoti; yathā pana na saṅghaṭṭeti, evaṁ atikkamma
atk-abh02a11:73_3: ṭhapite vedanā nuppajjati, cittaṁ ekaggaṁ hoti, seyyā phāsukā hoti. Tena vuttaṁ ‘‘pāde
atk-abh02a11:73_4: pādaṁ accādhāyā’’ti. Sato sampajānoti satiyā ceva sampajānapaññāya ca samannāgato
atk-abh02a11:73_5: hutvā. Iminā supariggāhakaṁ satisampajaññaṁ kathitaṁ. Uṭṭhānasaññaṁ manasikaritvāti
atk-abh02a11:73_6: asukavelāya nāma uṭṭhahissāmī’ti evaṁ uṭṭhānavelāparicchedakaṁ uṭṭhānasaññaṁ citte
atk-abh02a11:73_7: upetvā. Evaṁ katvā nipanno hi yathāparicchinnakāleyeva uṭṭhātuṁ yutto.
atk-abh02a11:74_1: paripākagatattā nepakkasaṅkhātaṁ paññañca yutto anuyutto pavattayamānoyeva jāgariyānuyogaṁ
atk-abh02a11:74_2: anuyutto viharatīti attho. Ettha ca vīriyaṁ lokiyalokuttaramissakaṁ kathitaṁ, paññāpi
atk-abh02a11:74_3: vīriyagatikā eva; vīriye lokiyamhi lokiyā, lokuttare lokuttarāti attho.
atk-abh02a11:75_1: dhammānaṁ. Ettāvatā sabbepi sattatiṁsa bodhipakkhiyadhamme samūhato gahetvā lokiyāyapi
atk-abh02a11:75_2: bhāvanāya ekārammaṇe ekato pavattanasamatthe bojjhaṅgeyeva dassento satta bojjhaṅgātiādimāha.
atk-abh02a11:75_3: Te lokiyalokuttaramissakāva kathitāti veditabbā. Sesamettha heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānatthameva.
atk-abh02a11:76_0: 523. Abhikkantetiādiniddese abhikkante paṭikkanteti ettha tāva abhikkantaṁ vuccati
atk-abh02a11:76_1: purato gamanaṁ. Paṭikkantanti nivattanaṁ. Tadubhayampi catūsu iriyāpathesu labbhati.
atk-abh02a11:76_2: Gamane tāva purato kāyaṁ abhiharanto abhikkamati nāma, paṭinivattanto paṭikkamati
atk-abh02a11:76_3: nāma. Ṭhānepi ṭhitakova kāyaṁ purato onāmento abhikkamati nāma, pacchato apanāmento
atk-abh02a11:76_4: paṭikkamati nāma. Nisajjāyapi nisinnakova āsannassa purimaaṅgābhimukho saṁsaranto
atk-abh02a11:76_5: abhikkamati nāma, pacchimaaṅgappadesaṁ paccāsaṁsaranto paṭikkamati nāma. Nipajjāyapi eseva nayo.
atk-abh02a11:77_0: Sampajānakārī hotīti sampajaññena sabbakiccakārī, sampajaññasseva vā kārī. So hi
atk-abh02a11:77_1: abhikkantādīsu sampajaññaṁ karoteva, na katthaci sampajaññavirahito hoti. Taṁ pana
atk-abh02a11:77_2: sampajaññaṁ yasmā satisampayuttameva hoti, tenassa niddese ‘‘sato sampajāno abhikkamati,
atk-abh02a11:78_0: Ayañhi abhikkamanto vā paṭikkamanto vā na muṭṭhassatī asampajāno hoti; satiyā pana
atk-abh02a11:78_1: samannāgato paññāya ca sampajānoyeva abhikkamati ceva paṭikkamati ca; sabbesu abhikkamādīsu
atk-abh02a11:78_2: catubbidhaṁ sampajaññaṁ otāreti. Catubbidhañhi sampajaññaṁ – sātthakasampajaññaṁ,
atk-abh02a11:78_4: uppanne cittavaseneva agantvā ‘kinnu me ettha gatena attho atthi, natthī’ti atthānatthaṁ
atk-abh02a11:78_6: dhammato vaḍḍhi. Cetiyaṁ vā bodhiṁ vā disvāpi hi buddhārammaṇaṁ pītiṁ, saṅghadassanena
atk-abh02a11:78_7: saṅghārammaṇaṁ pītiṁ uppādetvā tadeva khayavayato sammasanto arahattaṁ pāpuṇāti.
atk-abh02a11:78_8: There disvā tesaṁ ovāde patiṭṭhāya, asubhaṁ disvā tattha paṭhamajjhānaṁ uppādetvā
atk-abh02a11:78_9: tadeva khayavayato sammasanto arahattaṁ pāpuṇāti. Tasmā etesaṁ dassanaṁ sātthaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:78_10: Keci pana ‘‘āmisatopi vaḍḍhi atthoyeva; taṁ nissāya brahmacariyānuggahāya paṭipannattā’’ti vadanti.
atk-abh02a11:79_0: Tasmiṁ pana gamane sappāyāsappāyaṁ pariggahetvā sappāyapariggaṇhanaṁ ‘sappāyasampajaññaṁ’,
atk-abh02a11:79_1: seyyathidaṁ – cetiyadassanaṁ tāva sātthaṁ. Sace pana cetiyassa mahatiyā pūjāya dasadvādasayojanantare
atk-abh02a11:79_2: parisā sannipatanti , attano vibhavānurūpaṁ itthiyopi purisāpi alaṅkatapaṭiyattā
atk-abh02a11:79_3: cittakammarūpakāni viya sañcaranti, tatra cassa iṭṭhe ārammaṇe lobho, aniṭṭhe paṭigho,
atk-abh02a11:79_4: asamapekkhane moho uppajjati, kāyasaṁsaggāpattiṁ vā āpajjati, jīvitabrahmacariyānaṁ
atk-abh02a11:79_5: vā antarāyo hoti. Evaṁ taṁ ṭhānaṁ asappāyaṁ hoti. Vuttappakāraantarāyābhāve sappāyaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:79_6: Bodhidassanepi eseva nayo. Saṅghadassanampi sātthaṁ. Sace pana antogāme mahāmaṇḍapaṁ
atk-abh02a11:79_7: kāretvā sabbarattiṁ dhammassavanaṁ karontesu manussesu vuttappakāreneva janasannipāto
atk-abh02a11:79_8: ceva antarāyo ca hoti. Evaṁ taṁ ṭhānaṁ asappāyaṁ hoti; antarāyābhāve sappāyaṁ hoti.
atk-abh02a11:80_0: Asubhadassanampi sātthaṁ. Tadatthadīpanatthañca idaṁ vatthu – eko kira daharabhikkhu
atk-abh02a11:80_1: sāmaṇeraṁ gahetvā dantakaṭṭhatthāya gato. Sāmaṇero maggā okkamitvā purato gacchanto
atk-abh02a11:80_2: asubhaṁ disvā paṭhamajjhānaṁ nibbattetvā tadeva pādakaṁ katvā saṅkhāre sammasanto
atk-abh02a11:80_3: tīṇi phalāni sacchikatvā uparimaggatthāya kammaṭṭhānaṁ pariggahetvā aṭṭhāsi. Daharo
atk-abh02a11:80_4: taṁ apassanto ‘‘sāmaṇerā’’ti pakkosi. So ‘mayā pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya bhikkhunā
atk-abh02a11:80_5: saddhiṁ dve kathā nāma na kathitapubbā, aññasmiṁ divase uparivisesaṁ nibbattessāmī’ti
atk-abh02a11:80_6: cintetvā ‘‘kiṁ, bhante’’ti paṭivacanaṁ adāsi. ‘‘Ehī’’ti ca vutto ekavacaneneva āgantvā
atk-abh02a11:80_7: ‘‘bhante, iminā tāva maggena gantvā mayā ṭhitokāse muhuttaṁ puratthābhimukho ṭhatvā
atk-abh02a11:80_8: olokethā’’ti āha. So tathā katvā tena pattavisesameva pāpuṇi. Evaṁ ekaṁ asubhaṁ dvinnaṁ
atk-abh02a11:80_9: janānaṁ atthāya jātaṁ. Evaṁ sātthampi panetaṁ purisassa mātugāmāsubhaṁ asappāyaṁ,
atk-abh02a11:80_10: mātugāmassa ca purisāsubhaṁ, sabhāgameva sappāyanti. Evaṁ sappāyapariggaṇhanaṁ sappāyasampajaññaṁ nāma.
atk-abh02a11:81_0: Evaṁ pariggahitasātthasappāyassa pana aṭṭhatiṁsāya kammaṭṭhānesu attano cittaruciyaṁ
atk-abh02a11:81_1: kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṁ gocaraṁ uggahetvā bhikkhācāragocare taṁ gahetvāva gamanaṁ ‘gocarasampajaññaṁ’
atk-abh02a11:82_0: Idhekacco bhikkhu harati na paccāharati, ekacco na harati paccāharati, ekacco pana
atk-abh02a11:82_1: neva harati na paccāharati, ekacco harati ca paccāharati ca. Tattha yo bhikkhu divasaṁ
atk-abh02a11:82_2: caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṁ parisodhetvā, tathā rattiyā paṭhamayāme
atk-abh02a11:82_3: majjhimayāme seyyaṁ kappetvā pacchimayāmepi nisajjācaṅkamehi vītināmetvā pageva cetiyaṅgaṇabodhiyaṅgaṇavattaṁ
atk-abh02a11:82_4: katvā bodhirukkhe udakaṁ āsiñcitvā pānīyaṁ paribhojanīyaṁ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā ācariyupajjhāyavattādīni
atk-abh02a11:82_5: sabbāni khandhakavattāni samādāya vattati, so sarīraparikammaṁ katvā senāsanaṁ pavisitvā
atk-abh02a11:82_6: dve tayo pallaṅke usumaṁ gāhāpento kammaṭṭhānaṁ anuyuñjitvā, bhikkhācāravelāya uṭṭhahitvā
atk-abh02a11:82_7: kammaṭṭhānasīseneva pattacīvaramādāya senāsanato nikkhamitvā kammaṭṭhānaṁ manasikarontova
atk-abh02a11:82_8: cetiyaṅgaṇaṁ gantvā, sace buddhānussatikammaṭṭhānaṁ hoti taṁ avissajjetvāva cetiyaṅgaṇaṁ
atk-abh02a11:82_9: pavisati, aññaṁ ce kammaṭṭhānaṁ hoti sopānamūle ṭhatvā hatthena gahitabhaṇḍaṁ viya
atk-abh02a11:82_10: taṁ ṭhapetvā buddhārammaṇaṁ pītiṁ gahetvā cetiyaṅgaṇaṁ āruyha mahantaṁ cetiyaṁ ce,
atk-abh02a11:82_11: tikkhattuṁ padakkhiṇaṁ katvā catūsu ṭhānesu vanditabbaṁ, khuddakaṁ ce, tatheva padakkhiṇaṁ
atk-abh02a11:82_12: katvā aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu vanditabbaṁ. Cetiyaṁ vanditvā bodhiyaṅgaṇaṁ pattenāpi buddhassa
atk-abh02a11:82_13: bhagavato sammukhā viya nipaccākāraṁ dassetvā bodhi vanditabbā.
atk-abh02a11:83_0: So evaṁ cetiyañca bodhiñca vanditvā paṭisāmitaṭṭhānaṁ gantvā, paṭisāmitaṁ bhaṇḍakaṁ
atk-abh02a11:83_1: hatthena gaṇhanto viya, nikkhittakammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā gāmasamīpe kammaṭṭhānasīseneva
atk-abh02a11:83_2: cīvaraṁ pārupitvā gāmaṁ piṇḍāya pavisati. Atha naṁ manussā disvā ‘ayyo no āgato’ti
atk-abh02a11:83_3: paccuggantvā pattaṁ gahetvā āsanasālāya vā gehe vā nisīdāpetvā yāguṁ datvā yāva bhattaṁ
atk-abh02a11:83_4: na niṭṭhāti tāva pāde dhovitvā telena makkhetvā purato nisīditvā pañhaṁ vā pucchanti
atk-abh02a11:83_5: dhammaṁ vā sotukāmā honti. Sacepi na kathāpenti ‘‘janasaṅgahatthaṁ dhammakathā nāma
atk-abh02a11:83_6: kātabbāyevā’’ti aṭṭhakathācariyā vadanti. Dhammakathā hi kammaṭṭhānavinimuttā nāma
atk-abh02a11:83_7: natthi. Tasmā kammaṭṭhānasīseneva āhāraṁ paribhuñjitvā anumodanaṁ vatvā nivattiyamānehipi
atk-abh02a11:83_8: manussehi anugatova gāmato nikkhamitvā tattha te nivattetvā maggaṁ paṭipajjati.
atk-abh02a11:84_0: Atha naṁ puretaraṁ nikkhamitvā bahigāme katabhattakiccā sāmaṇeradaharabhikkhū disvā
atk-abh02a11:84_1: paccuggantvā pattacīvaramassa gaṇhanti. Porāṇakabhikkhū kira ‘amhākaṁ upajjhāyo,
atk-abh02a11:84_2: amhākaṁ ācariyo’ti na mukhaṁ oloketvā vattaṁ karonti, sampattaparicchedeneva karonti.
atk-abh02a11:84_3: Te taṁ pucchanti ‘‘bhante, ete manussā tumhākaṁ kiṁ honti? Mātipakkhato sambandhā
atk-abh02a11:84_4: pitipakkhato’’ti? ‘‘Kiṁ disvā pucchathā’’ti? ‘‘Tumhesu etesaṁ pemaṁ bahumāna’’nti.
atk-abh02a11:84_5: ‘‘Āvuso, yaṁ mātāpitūhipi dukkaraṁ taṁ ete manussā amhākaṁ karonti. Pattacīvarampi
atk-abh02a11:84_6: no etesaṁ santakameva, etesaṁ ānubhāvena neva bhaye bhayaṁ, na chātake chātakaṁ jānāma.
atk-abh02a11:84_7: Edisā nāma amhākaṁ upakārino natthī’’ti tesaṁ guṇe kathento gacchati. Ayaṁ vuccati
atk-abh02a11:85_0: Yassa pana pageva vuttappakāraṁ vattapaṭipattiṁ karontassa kammajatejo pajjalati,
atk-abh02a11:85_1: anupādinnakaṁ muñcitvā upādinnakaṁ gaṇhāti, sarīrato sedā muccanti, kammaṭṭhānaṁ
atk-abh02a11:85_2: vīthiṁ nārohati, so pageva pattacīvaramādāya vegasāva cetiyaṁ vanditvā gorūpānaṁ
atk-abh02a11:85_3: nikkhamanavelāyameva gāmaṁ yāgubhikkhāya pavisitvā yāguṁ labhitvā āsanasālaṁ gantvā
atk-abh02a11:85_4: pivati. Athassa dvattikkhattuṁ ajjhoharaṇamatteneva kammajatejodhātu upādinnakaṁ
atk-abh02a11:85_5: muñcitvā anupādinnakaṁ gaṇhāti, ghaṭasatena nhāto viya tejodhātupariḷāhanibbānaṁ
atk-abh02a11:85_6: patvā kammaṭṭhānasīsena yāguṁ paribhuñjitvā pattañca mukhañca dhovitvā antarābhatte
atk-abh02a11:85_7: kammaṭṭhānaṁ manasikatvā avasesaṭṭhāne piṇḍāya caritvā kammaṭṭhānasīsena āhāraṁ paribhuñjitvā
atk-abh02a11:85_8: tato paṭṭhāya poṅkhānupoṅkhaṁ upaṭṭhahamānaṁ kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvāva āgacchati. Ayaṁ
atk-abh02a11:85_9: vuccati ‘na harati paccāharatī’ti. Edisā ca bhikkhū yāguṁ pivitvā vipassanaṁ ārabhitvā
atk-abh02a11:85_10: buddhasāsane arahattaṁ pattā nāma gaṇanapathaṁ vītivattā. Sīhaḷadīpeyeva tesu tesu
atk-abh02a11:85_11: gāmesu āsanasālāya na taṁ āsanaṁ atthi, yattha yāguṁ pivitvā arahattaṁ pattā bhikkhū natthīti.
atk-abh02a11:86_0: Yo pamādavihārī hoti nikkhittadhuro sabbavattāni bhinditvā pañcavidhacetokhīlavinibandhabaddhacitto
atk-abh02a11:86_1: viharanto ‘kammaṭṭhānaṁ nāma atthī’tipi saññaṁ akatvā gāmaṁ piṇḍāya pavisitvā ananulomikena
atk-abh02a11:86_2: gihīsaṁsaggena saṁsaṭṭho caritvā ca bhuñjitvā ca tuccho nikkhamati – ayaṁ vuccati
atk-abh02a11:87_0: Yo panāyaṁ ‘‘harati ca paccāharati cā’’ti vutto, so gatapaccāgatikavattavasena veditabbo
atk-abh02a11:87_1: – atthakāmā hi kulaputtā sāsane pabbajitvā dasampi vīsampi tiṁsampi cattārīsampi
atk-abh02a11:87_2: paññāsampi satampi ekato vasantā katikavattaṁ katvā viharanti – ‘‘āvuso, tumhe na
atk-abh02a11:87_3: iṇaṭṭā, na bhayaṭṭā, na ājīvikāpakatā pabbajitā; dukkhā muñcitukāmā panettha pabbajitā.
atk-abh02a11:87_4: Tasmā gamane uppannakilesaṁ gamaneyeva niggaṇhatha. Ṭhāne, nisajjāya, sayane uppannakilesaṁ
atk-abh02a11:88_0: Te evaṁ katikavattaṁ katvā bhikkhācāraṁ gacchantā, aḍḍhausabhausabhaaḍḍhagāvutagāvutantaresu
atk-abh02a11:88_1: pāsāṇā honti, tāya saññāya kammaṭṭhānaṁ manasikarontāva gacchanti. Sace kassaci gamane
atk-abh02a11:88_2: kileso uppajjati, tattheva naṁ niggaṇhāti. Tathā asakkonto tiṭṭhati. Athassa pacchato
atk-abh02a11:88_3: āgacchantopi tiṭṭhati. So ‘ayaṁ bhikkhu tuyhaṁ uppannaṁ vitakkaṁ jānāti, ananucchavikaṁ
atk-abh02a11:88_4: te eta’nti attānaṁ paṭicodetvā vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā ariyabhūmiṁ okkamati. Tathā asakkonto
atk-abh02a11:88_5: nisīdati. Athassa pacchato āgacchantopi nisīdatīti so eva nayo. Ariyabhūmiṁ okkamituṁ
atk-abh02a11:88_6: asakkontopi taṁ kilesaṁ vikkhambhetvā kammaṭṭhānaṁ manasikarontova gacchati, na kammaṭṭhānavippayuttena
atk-abh02a11:88_7: cittena pādaṁ uddharati, uddharati ce paṭinivattitvā purimapadesaññeva eti, ālindakavāsī
atk-abh02a11:88_8: mahāphussadevatthero viya. So kira ekūnavīsati vassāni gatapaccāgatavattaṁ pūrento
atk-abh02a11:88_9: eva vihāsi. Manussāpi antarāmagge kasantā ca vapantā ca maddantā ca kammāni ca karontā
atk-abh02a11:88_10: theraṁ tathāgacchantaṁ disvā ‘‘ayaṁ thero punappunaṁ nivattitvā gacchati, kiṁ nu
atk-abh02a11:88_11: kho maggamūḷho udāhu kiñci pamuṭṭho’’ti samullapanti. So taṁ anādiyitvā kammaṭṭhānayuttacitteneva
atk-abh02a11:88_12: samaṇadhammaṁ karonto vīsativassabbhantare arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. Arahattapattadivase
atk-abh02a11:88_13: cassa caṅkamanakoṭiyaṁ adhivatthā devatā aṅgulīhi dīpaṁ ujjāletvā aṭṭhāsi. Cattāropi
atk-abh02a11:88_14: mahārājāno sakko ca devānamindo brahmā ca sahampati upaṭṭhānaṁ āgamiṁsu. Tañca obhāsaṁ
atk-abh02a11:88_15: disvā vanavāsī mahātissatthero taṁ dutiyadivase pucchi – ‘‘rattibhāge āyasmato santike
atk-abh02a11:88_16: obhāso ahosi. Kiṁ so obhāso’’ti? Thero vikkhepaṁ karonto ‘‘obhāso nāma dīpobhāsopi
atk-abh02a11:88_17: hoti, maṇiobhāsopī’’ti evamādimāha. Tato ‘‘paṭicchādetha tumhe’’ti nibaddho ‘‘āmā’’ti
atk-abh02a11:89_0: Kāḷavallimaṇḍapavāsī mahānāgatthero viya ca. Sopi kira gatapaccāgatavattaṁ pūrento
atk-abh02a11:89_1: ‘paṭhamaṁ tāva bhagavato mahāpadhānaṁ pūjessāmī’ti satta vassāni ṭhānacaṅkamameva
atk-abh02a11:89_2: adhiṭṭhāsi; puna soḷasa vassāni gatapaccāgatavattaṁ pūretvā arahattaṁ pāpuṇi. So
atk-abh02a11:89_3: kammaṭṭhānayutteneva cittena pādaṁ uddharanto vippayuttena cittena uddhate pāde paṭinivattento
atk-abh02a11:89_4: gāmasīmaṁ gantvā ‘gāvī nu kho, pabbajito nu kho’ti āsaṅkanīyappadese ṭhatvā cīvaraṁ
atk-abh02a11:89_5: pārupitvā kacchakantarato udakena pattaṁ dhovitvā udakagaṇḍūsaṁ karoti. Kiṁ kāraṇā?
atk-abh02a11:89_6: ‘Mā me bhikkhaṁ dātuṁ vā vandituṁ vā āgate manusse ‘dīghāyukā hothā’ti vacanamattenāpi
atk-abh02a11:89_7: kammaṭṭhānavikkhepo ahosī’ti. ‘Ajja, bhante, katimī’ti divasaṁ vā bhikkhugaṇanaṁ
atk-abh02a11:89_8: vā pañhaṁ vā pucchito pana udakaṁ gilitvā āroceti; sace divasādipucchakā na honti,
atk-abh02a11:90_0: Kalambatitthavihāre vassūpagatā paññāsa bhikkhū viya ca. Te kira āsāḷhipuṇṇimāyaṁ
atk-abh02a11:90_1: katikavattaṁ akaṁsu – ‘‘arahattaṁ appatvā aññamaññaṁ nālapissāmā’’ti. Gāmañca piṇḍāya
atk-abh02a11:90_2: pavisantā udakagaṇḍūsaṁ katvā pavisiṁsu, divasādīsu pucchitesu vuttanayena paṭipajjiṁsu.
atk-abh02a11:90_3: Tattha manussā niṭṭhubhanaṭṭhānaṁ disvā jāniṁsu – ‘ajja eko āgato, ajja dve’ti; evañca
atk-abh02a11:90_4: cintesuṁ – ‘kinnu kho ete amheheva saddhiṁ na sallapanti udāhu aññamaññampi? Yadi
atk-abh02a11:90_5: aññamaññampi na sallapanti, addhā vivādajātā bhavissanti; etha ne aññamaññaṁ khamāpessāmā’ti
atk-abh02a11:90_6: sabbe vihāraṁ gantvā paññāsāya bhikkhūsu dvepi bhikkhū ekokāse nāddasaṁsu. Tato yo
atk-abh02a11:90_7: tesu cakkhumā puriso so āha – ‘‘na, bho, kalahakārakānaṁ vasanokāso īdiso hoti. Susammaṭṭhaṁ
atk-abh02a11:90_9: Te tatova nivattā. Tepi bhikkhū antotemāseyeva arahattaṁ patvā mahāpavāraṇāya visuddhipavāraṇaṁ pavāresuṁ.
atk-abh02a11:91_0: Evaṁ kāḷavallimaṇḍapavāsī mahānāgatthero viya, kalambutitthavihāre vassūpagatabhikkhū
atk-abh02a11:91_1: viya ca kammaṭṭhānayutteneva cittena pādaṁ uddharanto gāmasamīpaṁ gantvā udakagaṇḍūsaṁ
atk-abh02a11:91_2: katvā vīthiyo sallakkhetvā yattha surāsoṇḍadhuttādayo kalahakārakā caṇḍahatthiassādayo
atk-abh02a11:91_3: vā natthi, taṁ vīthiṁ paṭipajjati. Tattha piṇḍāya caramāno na turitaturito viya javena
atk-abh02a11:91_4: gacchati, na hi javanapiṇḍapātikadhutaṅgaṁ nāma kiñci atthi, visamabhūmibhāgappattaṁ
atk-abh02a11:91_5: pana udakasakaṭaṁ viya niccalo hutvā gacchati, anugharaṁ paviṭṭho ca dātukāmaṁ vā
atk-abh02a11:91_6: adātukāmaṁ vā sallakkhetuṁ tadanurūpaṁ kālaṁ āgamento bhikkhaṁ gahetvā antogāme vā
atk-abh02a11:91_7: bahigāme vā vihārameva vā āgantvā , yathāphāsuke patirūpe okāse nisīditvā, kammaṭṭhānaṁ
atk-abh02a11:91_9: paccavekkhanto aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṁ āhāraṁ āhāreti neva davāya, na madāya, na maṇḍanāya,
atk-abh02a11:91_10: na vibhūsanāya…pe… phāsuvihāro cāti. Bhuttāvī ca udakakiccaṁ katvā muhuttaṁ bhattakilamathaṁ
atk-abh02a11:91_11: paṭippassambhetvā yathā purebhattaṁ, evaṁ pacchābhattaṁ purimayāmaṁ pacchimayāmañca
atk-abh02a11:91_12: kammaṭṭhānameva manasikaroti. Ayaṁ vuccati ‘harati ca paccāharati cā’ti.
atk-abh02a11:92_0: Imaṁ pana haraṇapaccāharaṇasaṅkhātaṁ gatapaccāgatavattaṁ pūrento, yadi upanissayasampanno
atk-abh02a11:92_1: hoti, paṭhamavaye eva arahattaṁ pāpuṇāti, no ce paṭhamavaye pāpuṇāti atha majjhimavaye,
atk-abh02a11:92_2: no ce majjhimavaye pāpuṇāti atha pacchimavaye, no ce pacchimavaye pāpuṇāti atha maraṇasamaye,
atk-abh02a11:92_3: no ce maraṇasamaye pāpuṇāti atha devaputto hutvā, no ce devaputto hutvā pāpuṇāti
atk-abh02a11:92_4: anuppanne buddhe nibbatto paccekabodhiṁ sacchikaroti, no ce paccekabodhiṁ sacchikaroti
atk-abh02a11:92_5: atha buddhānaṁ sammukhībhāve khippābhiñño vā hoti – seyyathāpi thero bāhiyo dārucīriyo,
atk-abh02a11:92_6: mahāpañño vā – seyyathāpi thero sāriputto, mahiddhiko vā – seyyathāpi thero mahāmoggallāno,
atk-abh02a11:92_7: dhutaṅgadharo vā – seyyathāpi thero mahākassapo, dibbacakkhuko vā – seyyathāpi thero
atk-abh02a11:92_8: anuruddho, vinayadharo vā – seyyathāpi thero upāli, dhammakathiko vā – seyyathāpi
atk-abh02a11:92_9: thero puṇṇo mantāṇiputto, āraññiko vā – seyyathāpi thero revato, bahussuto vā – seyyathāpi
atk-abh02a11:92_10: thero ānando, sikkhākāmo vā – seyyathāpi thero rāhulo buddhaputtoti. Iti imasmiṁ
atk-abh02a11:92_11: catukke yvāyaṁ harati ca paccāharati ca, tassa gocarasampajaññaṁ sikhāppattaṁ hoti.
atk-abh02a11:93_0: Abhikkamādīsu pana asammuyhanaṁ asammohasampajaññaṁ. Taṁ evaṁ veditabbaṁ – idha bhikkhu
atk-abh02a11:93_1: abhikkamanto vā paṭikkamanto vā yathā andhabālaputhujjanā abhikkamādīsu ‘attā abhikkamati,
atk-abh02a11:93_2: attanā abhikkamo nibbattito’ti vā ‘ahaṁ abhikkamāmi, mayā abhikkamo nibbattito’ti
atk-abh02a11:93_3: vā sammuyhanti, tathā asammuyhanto ‘abhikkamāmī’ti citte uppajjamāne teneva cittena
atk-abh02a11:93_4: saddhiṁ cittasamuṭṭhānavāyodhātu viññattiṁ janayamānā uppajjati. Iti cittakiriyāvāyodhātuvipphāravasena
atk-abh02a11:93_5: ayaṁ kāyasammato aṭṭhisaṅghāto abhikkamati. Tassevaṁ abhikkamato ekekapāduddharaṇe
atk-abh02a11:93_6: pathavīdhātu āpodhātūti dve dhātuyo omattā honti mandā, itarā dve adhimattā honti
atk-abh02a11:93_7: balavatiyo; tathā atiharaṇavītiharaṇesu. Vossajjane tejodhātu vāyodhātūti dve dhātuyo
atk-abh02a11:93_8: omattā honti mandā, itarā dve adhimattā honti balavatiyo; tathā sannikkhepanasannirujjhanesu
atk-abh02a11:93_9: tattha uddharaṇe pavattā rūpārūpadhammā atiharaṇaṁ na pāpuṇanti; tathā atiharaṇe
atk-abh02a11:93_10: pavattā vītiharaṇaṁ, vītiharaṇe pavattā vossajjanaṁ, vossajjane pavattā sannikkhepanaṁ,
atk-abh02a11:93_11: sannikkhepane pavattā sannirujjhanaṁ na pāpuṇanti; tattha tattheva pabbaṁ pabbaṁ
atk-abh02a11:93_12: sandhi sandhi odhi odhi hutvā tattakapāle pakkhittatilaṁ viya paṭapaṭāyantā bhijjanti.
atk-abh02a11:93_13: Tattha ko eko abhikkamati? Kassa vā ekassa abhikkamanaṁ? Paramatthato hi dhātūnaṁyeva
atk-abh02a11:93_14: gamanaṁ, dhātūnaṁ ṭhānaṁ, dhātūnaṁ nisajjā, dhātūnaṁ sayanaṁ, tasmiṁ tasmiñhi koṭṭhāse saddhiṁ rūpehi –
atk-abh02a11:94: Aññaṁ uppajjate cittaṁ, aññaṁ cittaṁ nirujjhati;
atk-abh02a11:97: Niṭṭhito abhikkante paṭikkante sampajānakārī hotītipadassa attho.
atk-abh02a11:98_0: Ālokite vilokiteti ettha pana ālokitaṁ nāma purato pekkhanaṁ, vilokitaṁ nāma anudisāpekkhanaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:98_1: Aññānipi heṭṭhā upari pacchato pekkhanavasena olokitaullokitāpalokitāni nāma honti.
atk-abh02a11:98_2: Tāni idha na gahitāni. Sāruppavasena pana imāneva dve gahitāni. Iminā vā mukhena
atk-abh02a11:99: Tattha ‘ālokessāmī’ti citte uppanne cittavaseneva anoloketvā atthapariggaṇhanaṁ ‘sātthakasampajaññaṁ’. Taṁ āyasmantaṁ nandaṁ kāyasakkhiṁ katvā veditabbaṁ. Vuttañhetaṁ bhagavatā –
atk-abh02a11:100_0: ‘‘Sace, bhikkhave, nandassa puratthimā disā āloketabbā hoti, sabbaṁ cetasā samannāharitvā
atk-abh02a11:100_1: nando puratthimaṁ disaṁ āloketi – ‘evaṁ me puratthimaṁ disaṁ ālokayato na abhijjhādomanassā
atk-abh02a11:100_2: pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssavissantī’ti. Itiha sātthakasampajāno hoti. ‘‘Sace, bhikkhave,
atk-abh02a11:100_3: nandassa pacchimā disā, uttarā disā, dakkhiṇā disā, uddhaṁ, adho, anudisā anuviloketabbā
atk-abh02a11:100_4: hoti, sabbaṁ cetasā samannāharitvā nando anudisaṁ anuviloketi – evaṁ me anudisaṁ
atk-abh02a11:101: Apica idhāpi pubbe vuttacetiyadassanādivaseneva sātthakatā ca sappāyatā ca veditabbā.
atk-abh02a11:102_1: attano kammaṭṭhānavaseneva, kasiṇādikammaṭṭhānikehi vā pana kammaṭṭhānasīseneva ālokanavilokanaṁ kātabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:103_0: Abbhantare attā nāma āloketā vā viloketā vā natthi. ‘Ālokessāmī’ti pana citte uppajjamāne
atk-abh02a11:103_1: teneva cittena saddhiṁ cittasamuṭṭhānā vāyodhātu viññattiṁ janayamānā uppajjati.
atk-abh02a11:103_2: Iti cittakiriyāvāyodhātuvipphāravasena heṭṭhimaṁ akkhidalaṁ adho sīdati, uparimaṁ
atk-abh02a11:103_3: uddhaṁ laṅgheti. Koci yantakena vivaranto nāma natthi. Tato cakkhuviññāṇaṁ dassanakiccaṁ
atk-abh02a11:103_4: sādhentaṁ uppajjatī’ti evaṁ pajānanaṁ panettha ‘asammohasampajaññaṁ’ nāma.
atk-abh02a11:104: Apica mūlapariññāāgantukatāvakālikabhāvavasena panettha asammohasampajaññaṁ veditabbaṁ. Mūlapariññāvasena tāva –
atk-abh02a11:107_0: Tattha bhavaṅgaṁ upapattibhavassa aṅgakiccaṁ sādhayamānaṁ pavattati; taṁ āvattetvā
atk-abh02a11:107_1: kiriyamanodhātu āvajjanakiccaṁ sādhayamānā; tannirodhā cakkhuviññāṇaṁ dassanakiccaṁ
atk-abh02a11:107_2: sādhayamānaṁ; tannirodhā vipākamanodhātu sampaṭicchanakiccaṁ sādhayamānā; tannirodhā
atk-abh02a11:107_4: voṭṭhabbanakiccaṁ sādhayamānā; tannirodhā sattakkhattuṁ javanaṁ javati. Tattha paṭhamajavanepi
atk-abh02a11:107_5: ‘ayaṁ itthī, ayaṁ puriso’ti rajjanadussanamuyhanavasena ālokitavilokitaṁ na hoti;
atk-abh02a11:107_6: dutiyajavanepi…pe… sattamajavanepi. Etesu pana, yuddhamaṇḍale yodhesu viya, heṭṭhupariyavasena
atk-abh02a11:107_7: bhijjitvā patitesu ‘ayaṁ itthī, ayaṁ puriso’ti rajjanādivasena ālokitavilokitaṁ hoti.
atk-abh02a11:108_0: Cakkhudvāre pana rūpe āpāthagate bhavaṅgacalanato uddhaṁ sakasakakiccanipphādanavasena
atk-abh02a11:108_1: āvajjanādīsu uppajjitvā niruddhesu avasāne javanaṁ uppajjati. Taṁ pubbe uppannānaṁ
atk-abh02a11:108_2: āvajjanādīnaṁ gehabhūte cakkhudvāre āgantukapuriso viya hoti. Tassa yathā paragehe
atk-abh02a11:108_3: kiñci yācituṁ paviṭṭhassa āgantukapurisassa gehasāmikesupi tuṇhīmāsinesu āṇākaraṇaṁ
atk-abh02a11:108_4: na yuttaṁ, evaṁ āvajjanādīnaṁ gehabhūte cakkhudvāre āvajjanādīsupi arajjantesu adussantesu
atk-abh02a11:108_5: amuyhantesu ca rajjanadussanamuyhanaṁ ayuttanti. Evaṁ ‘āgantukabhāvavasena’ asammohasampajaññaṁ veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:109_0: Yāni panetāni cakkhudvāre voṭṭhabbanapariyosānāni cittāni uppajjanti, tāni saddhiṁ
atk-abh02a11:109_1: sampayuttadhammehi tattha tattheva bhijjanti, aññamaññaṁ na passantīti ittarāni tāvakālikāni
atk-abh02a11:109_2: honti. Tattha yathā ekasmiṁ ghare sabbesu mānusakesu matesu avasesassa ekakassa taṅkhaṇaṁyeva
atk-abh02a11:109_3: maraṇadhammassa na yuttā naccagītādīsu abhirati nāma, evameva ekadvāre sasampayuttesu
atk-abh02a11:109_4: āvajjanādīsu tattha tattheva matesu avasesassa taṅkhaṇaṁññeva maraṇadhammassa javanassāpi
atk-abh02a11:109_5: rajjanadussanamuyhanavasena abhirati nāma na yuttāti. Evaṁ ‘tāvakālikabhāvavasena’
atk-abh02a11:110_1: ceva rūpāni ca rūpakkhandho, dassanaṁ viññāṇakkhandho, taṁsampayuttā vedanā vedanākkhandho,
atk-abh02a11:110_2: saññā saññākkhandho, phassādikā saṅkhārakkhandho. Evametesaṁ pañcannaṁ khandhānaṁ
atk-abh02a11:110_3: samavāye ālokanavilokanaṁ paññāyati. Tattha ko eko āloketi? Ko viloketi?
atk-abh02a11:111_0: Tathā cakkhu cakkhāyatanaṁ, rūpaṁ rūpāyatanaṁ, dassanaṁ manāyatanaṁ, vedanādayo taṁsampayuttā
atk-abh02a11:111_1: dhammā dhammāyatanaṁ. Evametesaṁ catunnaṁ āyatanānaṁ samavāye ālokanavilokanaṁ paññāyati.
atk-abh02a11:111_2: Tattha ko eko āloketi? Ko viloketi?
atk-abh02a11:112_0: Tathā cakkhu cakkhudhātu, rūpaṁ rūpadhātu, dassanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇadhātu, taṁsampayuttā
atk-abh02a11:112_1: vedanādayo dhammā dhammadhātu. Evametāsaṁ catunnaṁ dhātūnaṁ samavāye ālokanavilokanaṁ
atk-abh02a11:112_2: paññāyati. Tattha ko eko āloketi? Ko viloketi?
atk-abh02a11:113_0: Tathā cakkhu nissayapaccayo, rūpaṁ ārammaṇapaccayo, āvajjanaṁ anantarasamanantaraanantarūpanissayanatthivigatapaccayo,
atk-abh02a11:113_1: āloko upanissayapaccayo, vedanādayo sahajātādipaccayā. Evametesaṁ paccayānaṁ samavāye
atk-abh02a11:113_2: ālokanavilokanaṁ paññāyati. Tattha ko eko āloketi? Ko viloketīti? Evamettha khandhāyatanadhātupaccayapaccavekkhaṇavasenāpi
atk-abh02a11:114_0: Samiñjite pasāriteti pabbānaṁ samiñjanapasāraṇe. Tattha cittavaseneva samiñjanapasāraṇaṁ
atk-abh02a11:114_1: akatvā hatthapādānaṁ samiñjanapasāraṇapaccayā atthānatthaṁ pariggahetvā tattha atthapariggaṇhanaṁ
atk-abh02a11:114_2: ‘sātthakasampajaññaṁ’. Tattha hatthapāde aticiraṁ samiñjitvā vā pasāretvā eva vā
atk-abh02a11:114_3: ṭhitassa khaṇe khaṇe vedanā uppajjanti, cittaṁ ekaggataṁ na labhati, kammaṭṭhānaṁ
atk-abh02a11:114_4: paripatati, visesaṁ nādhigacchati; kāle samiñjantassa kāle pasārentassa pana tā vedanā
atk-abh02a11:114_5: nuppajjanti, cittaṁ ekaggaṁ hoti, kammaṭṭhānaṁ phātiṁ gacchati, visesamadhigacchatīti.
atk-abh02a11:115: Atthe pana satipi sappāyāsappāyaṁ pariggahetvā sappāyapariggaṇhanaṁ ‘sappāyasampajaññaṁ’.
atk-abh02a11:116_0: Tatrāyaṁ nayo – mahācetiyaṅgaṇe kira daharabhikkhū sajjhāyaṁ gaṇhanti. Tesaṁ piṭṭhipasse
atk-abh02a11:116_1: daharabhikkhuniyo dhammaṁ suṇanti. Tatreko daharo hatthaṁ pasārento kāyasaṁsaggaṁ
atk-abh02a11:116_2: patvā teneva kāraṇena gihī jāto. Aparo bhikkhu pādaṁ pasārento aggimhi pasāresi.
atk-abh02a11:116_3: Aṭṭhiṁ āhacca pādo jhāyi. Aparo bhikkhu vammike pasāresi. So āsīvisena daṭṭho. Aparo
atk-abh02a11:116_4: bhikkhu cīvarakuṭidaṇḍake pasāresi. Taṁ maṇisappo ḍaṁsi. Tasmā evarūpe asappāye apasāretvā
atk-abh02a11:117_0: ‘Gocarasampajaññaṁ’ pana mahātheravatthunā dīpetabbaṁ – mahāthero kira divāṭṭhāne
atk-abh02a11:117_1: nisinno antevāsikehi saddhiṁ kathayamāno sahasā hatthaṁ samiñjitvā puna yathāṭhāne
atk-abh02a11:117_2: ṭhapetvā saṇikaṁ samiñjesi. Taṁ antevāsikā pucchiṁsu – ‘‘kasmā, bhante, sahasā hatthaṁ
atk-abh02a11:117_3: samiñjitvā puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā saṇikaṁ samiñjitthā’’ti? ‘‘Yato paṭṭhāya mayā,
atk-abh02a11:117_4: āvuso, kammaṭṭhānaṁ manasikātuṁ āraddho, na me kammaṭṭhānaṁ muñcitvā hattho samiñjitapubbo.
atk-abh02a11:117_5: Idāni pana me tumhehi saddhiṁ kathayamānena kammaṭṭhānaṁ muñcitvā samiñjito. Tasmā
atk-abh02a11:117_6: puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā samiñjesi’’nti. ‘‘Sādhu, bhante, bhikkhunā nāma evarūpena
atk-abh02a11:118_0: ‘Abbhantare attā nāma koci samiñjento vā pasārento vā natthi. Vuttappakāracittakiriyāvāyodhātuvipphārena
atk-abh02a11:118_1: pana, suttākaḍḍhanavasena dāruyantassa hatthapādacalanaṁ viya, samiñjanapasāraṇaṁ
atk-abh02a11:119_2: tāva nivāsetvā pārupitvā ca piṇḍāya carato ‘‘āmisalābho sītassa paṭighātāyā’’tiādinā
atk-abh02a11:119_3: nayena bhagavatā vuttappakāroyeva ca attho ‘attho’ nāma. Tassa vasena ‘sātthakasampajaññaṁ’ veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:120_0: Uṇhapakatikassa pana dubbalassa ca cīvaraṁ sukhumaṁ sappāyaṁ, sītālukassa ghanaṁ
atk-abh02a11:120_1: dupaṭṭaṁ; viparītaṁ asappāyaṁ. Yassa kassaci jiṇṇaṁ asappāyameva. Aggaḷādidānena
atk-abh02a11:120_2: hissa taṁ palibodhakaraṁ hoti. Tathā paṭṭuṇṇadukūlādibhedaṁ corānaṁ lobhanīyacīvaraṁ.
atk-abh02a11:120_3: Tādisañhi araññe ekakassa nivāsantarāyakaraṁ jīvitantarāyakarañcāpi hoti. Nippariyāyena
atk-abh02a11:120_4: pana yaṁ nimittakammādimicchājīvavasena uppannaṁ, yañcassa sevamānassa akusalā dhammā
atk-abh02a11:120_5: abhivaḍḍhanti, kusalā dhammā parihāyanti, taṁ asappāyaṁ ; viparītaṁ sappāyaṁ. Tassa
atk-abh02a11:121_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci cīvaraṁ pārupanto natthi. Vuttappakāracittakiriyāvāyodhātuvipphāreneva
atk-abh02a11:121_1: pana cīvarapārupanaṁ hoti. Tattha cīvarampi acetanaṁ, kāyopi acetano. Cīvaraṁ na
atk-abh02a11:121_2: jānāti – ‘mayā kāyo pārupito’ti, kāyopi na jānāti – ‘ahaṁ cīvarena pārupito’ti. Dhātuyova
atk-abh02a11:121_3: dhātusamūhaṁ paṭicchādenti, paṭapilotikāya potthakarūpapaṭicchādane viya. Tasmā neva
atk-abh02a11:121_4: sundaraṁ cīvaraṁ labhitvā somanassaṁ kātabbaṁ , na asundaraṁ labhitvā domanassaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:121_5: Nāgavammikacetiyarukkhādīsu hi keci mālāgandhadhūpavatthādīhi sakkāraṁ karonti, keci
atk-abh02a11:121_7: somanassaṁ vā domanassaṁ vā karonti. Evameva neva sundaraṁ cīvaraṁ labhitvā somanassaṁ
atk-abh02a11:121_8: kātabbaṁ, na asundaraṁ labhitvā domanassanti. Evaṁ pavattapaṭisaṅkhānavasenettha
atk-abh02a11:122_0: Pattadhāraṇepi pattaṁ sahasāva aggahetvā ‘imaṁ gahetvā piṇḍāya caramāno bhikkhaṁ
atk-abh02a11:122_2: veditabbaṁ. Kisadubbalasarīrassa pana garupatto asappāyo; yassa kassaci catupañcagaṇṭhikāhato
atk-abh02a11:122_3: dubbisodhanīyo asappāyova. Duddhotapatto hi na vaṭṭati; taṁ dhovantasseva cassa palibodho
atk-abh02a11:122_4: hoti. Maṇivaṇṇapatto pana lobhanīyova cīvare vuttanayeneva asappāyo. Nimittakammādivasena
atk-abh02a11:122_5: pana laddho, yañcassa sevamānassa akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, kusalā dhammā parihāyanti,
atk-abh02a11:122_6: ayaṁ ekantāsappāyova viparīto sappāyo. Tassa vasenettha ‘sappāyasampajaññaṁ’ kammaṭṭhānāvijahanavaseneva
atk-abh02a11:123_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci pattaṁ gaṇhanto natthi. Vuttappakāracittakiriyāvāyodhātuvipphāravaseneva
atk-abh02a11:123_1: pana pattaggahaṇaṁ nāma hoti. Tattha pattopi acetano, hatthāpi acetanā. Patto na
atk-abh02a11:123_2: jānāti – ‘ahaṁ hatthehi gahito’ti. Hatthāpi na jānanti – ‘patto amhehi gahito’ti.
atk-abh02a11:123_3: Dhātuyova dhātusamūhaṁ gaṇhanti, saṇḍāsena aggivaṇṇapattagahaṇe viyāti. Evaṁ pavattapaṭisaṅkhānavasenettha
atk-abh02a11:124_0: Apica yathā chinnahatthapāde vaṇamukhehi paggharitapubbalohitakimikule nīlamakkhikasamparikiṇṇe
atk-abh02a11:124_1: anāthasālāyaṁ anāthamanusse disvā dayālukā purisā tesaṁ vaṇabandhapaṭṭacoḷakāni ceva
atk-abh02a11:124_2: kapālādīhi ca bhesajjāni upanāmenti. Tattha coḷakānipi kesañci saṇhāni kesañci thūlāni
atk-abh02a11:124_3: pāpuṇanti. Bhesajjakapālakānipi kesañci susaṇṭhānāni kesañci dussaṇṭhānāni pāpuṇanti.
atk-abh02a11:124_4: Na te tattha sumanā vā honti dummanā vā. Vaṇapaṭicchādanamatteneva hi coḷakena, bhesajjapariggahaṇamatteneva
atk-abh02a11:124_5: ca kapālakena tesaṁ attho. Evameva yo bhikkhu vaṇacoḷakaṁ viya cīvaraṁ, bhesajjakapālakaṁ
atk-abh02a11:124_6: viya ca pattaṁ, kapāle bhesajjamiva ca patte laddhabhikkhaṁ sallakkheti – ayaṁ saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇe
atk-abh02a11:125_0: Asitādīsu asiteti piṇḍapātādibhojane. Pīteti yāguādipāne. Khāyiteti piṭṭhakhajjakādikhādane.
atk-abh02a11:125_1: Sāyiteti madhuphāṇitādisāyane. Tattha ‘‘neva davāyā’’tiādinā nayena vutto aṭṭhavidhopi
atk-abh02a11:126_0: Lūkhapaṇītatittamadhurādīsu pana yena bhojanena yassa aphāsu hoti, taṁ tassa asappāyaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:126_1: Yaṁ pana nimittakammādivasena paṭiladdhaṁ, yañcassa bhuñjato akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti,
atk-abh02a11:126_2: kusalā dhammā parihāyanti, taṁ ekantaṁ asappāyameva; viparītaṁ sappāyaṁ. Tassa vasenettha
atk-abh02a11:127_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci bhuñjako natthi. Vuttappakāracittakiriyāvāyodhātuvipphāreneva
atk-abh02a11:127_1: pana pattapaṭiggahaṇaṁ nāma hoti. Cittakiriyāvāyodhātuvipphāreneva hatthassa patte
atk-abh02a11:127_2: otāraṇaṁ nāma hoti. Cittakiriyāvāyodhātuvipphāreneva ālopakaraṇaṁ, ālopauddharaṇaṁ,
atk-abh02a11:127_3: mukhavivaraṇañca hoti. Na koci kuñcikāya, na yantakena hanukaṭṭhiṁ vivarati. Cittakiriyāvāyodhātuvipphāreneva
atk-abh02a11:127_4: ālopassa mukhe ṭhapanaṁ, uparidantānaṁ musalakiccasādhanaṁ, heṭṭhādantānaṁ udukkhalakiccasādhanaṁ,
atk-abh02a11:127_5: jivhāya hatthakiccasādhanañca hoti. Iti naṁ tattha aggajivhāya tanukakheḷo mūlajivhāya
atk-abh02a11:127_6: bahalakheḷo makkheti. Taṁ heṭṭhādantaudukkhale jivhāhatthaparivattitaṁ kheḷaudakatemitaṁ
atk-abh02a11:127_7: uparidantamusalasañcuṇṇitaṁ koci kaṭacchunā vā dabbiyā vā anto pavesento nāma natthi;
atk-abh02a11:127_8: vāyodhātuyāva pavisati. Paviṭṭhaṁ paviṭṭhaṁ koci palālasanthāraṁ katvā dhārento nāma
atk-abh02a11:127_9: natthi; vāyodhātuvaseneva tiṭṭhati. Ṭhitaṁ ṭhitaṁ koci uddhanaṁ katvā aggiṁ jāletvā
atk-abh02a11:127_10: pacanto nāma natthi; tejodhātuyāva paccati. Pakkaṁ pakkaṁ koci daṇḍakena vā yaṭṭhiyā
atk-abh02a11:127_11: vā bahi nīhārako nāma natthi; vāyodhātuyeva nīharati. Iti vāyodhātu atiharati ca
atk-abh02a11:127_12: vītiharati ca dhāreti ca parivatteti ca sañcuṇṇeti ca visoseti ca nīharati ca. Pathavīdhātu
atk-abh02a11:127_13: dhāreti ca parivatteti ca sañcuṇṇeti ca visoseti ca nīharati ca. Āpodhātu sineheti
atk-abh02a11:127_14: ca allattañca anupāleti. Tejodhātu antopaviṭṭhaṁ paripāceti. Ākāsadhātu añjaso hoti.
atk-abh02a11:127_15: Viññāṇadhātu tattha tattha sammāpayogamanvāya ābhujatīti. Evaṁ pavattapaṭisaṅkhānavasenettha
atk-abh02a11:128_0: Apica gamanato, pariyesanato, paribhogato, āsayato, nidhānato, aparipakkato, paripakkato,
atk-abh02a11:128_2: ‘asammohasampajaññaṁ’ veditabbaṁ. Vitthārakathā panettha visuddhimagge āhārapaṭikūlasaññāniddesato gahetabbā.
atk-abh02a11:129_0: Uccārapassāvakammeti uccārassa ca passāvassa ca karaṇe. Tattha pakkakāle uccārapassāvaṁ
atk-abh02a11:129_1: akarontassa sakalasarīrato sedā muccanti, akkhīni bhamanti, cittaṁ na ekaggaṁ hoti,
atk-abh02a11:129_2: aññe ca rogā uppajjanti; karontassa pana sabbaṁ taṁ na hotīti ayamettha attho. Tassa
atk-abh02a11:130_0: Aṭṭhāne uccārapassāvaṁ karontassa pana āpatti hoti, ayaso vaḍḍhati, jīvitantarāyo
atk-abh02a11:130_1: hoti; patirūpe ṭhāne karontassa sabbaṁ taṁ na hotīti idamettha sappāyaṁ. Tassa vasena
atk-abh02a11:131_0: Abbhantare attā nāma koci uccārapassāvakammaṁ karonto natthi. Cittakiriyāvāyodhātuvipphāreneva
atk-abh02a11:131_1: pana uccārapassāvakammaṁ hoti. Yathā pana pakke gaṇḍe gaṇḍabhedena pubbalohitaṁ akāmatāya
atk-abh02a11:131_2: nikkhamati, yathā ca atibharitā udakabhājanā udakaṁ akāmatāya nikkhamati, evaṁ pakkāsayamuttavatthīsu
atk-abh02a11:131_3: sannicitā uccārapassāvā vāyuvegasamuppīḷitā akāmatāyapi nikkhamanti. So panāyaṁ evaṁ
atk-abh02a11:131_4: nikkhamanto uccārapassāvo neva tassa bhikkhuno attano hoti na parassa; kevalaṁ pana
atk-abh02a11:131_5: sarīranissandova hoti. Yathā kiṁ? Yathā udakatumbhato purāṇaudakaṁ chaḍḍentassa neva
atk-abh02a11:131_6: taṁ attano hoti na paresaṁ, kevalaṁ paṭijagganamattameva hoti, evanti. Evaṁ pavattapaṭisaṅkhānavasenettha
atk-abh02a11:132: Gatādīsu gateti gamane. Ṭhiteti ṭhāne. Nisinneti nisajjāya. Sutteti sayane. Tattha abhikkantādīsu vuttanayeneva sampajānakāritā veditabbā.
atk-abh02a11:133_0: Ayaṁ panettha aparopi nayo – eko hi bhikkhu gacchanto aññaṁ cintento aññaṁ vitakkento
atk-abh02a11:133_1: gacchati. Eko kammaṭṭhānaṁ avissajjetvāva gacchati. Tathā eko bhikkhu tiṭṭhanto,
atk-abh02a11:133_2: nisīdanto, sayanto aññaṁ cintento aññaṁ vitakkento sayati. Eko kammaṭṭhānaṁ avissajjetvāva sayati.
atk-abh02a11:134_0: Ettakena pana na pākaṭaṁ hotīti caṅkamena dīpayiṁsu. Yo hi bhikkhu caṅkamanaṁ otaritvā
atk-abh02a11:134_2: pacchimacaṅkamanakoṭiṁ appatvā ettheva niruddhā, pacchimacaṅkamanakoṭiyaṁ pavattāpi
atk-abh02a11:134_3: pācīnacaṅkamanakoṭiṁ appatvā ettheva niruddhā, caṅkamanavemajjhe pavattā ubho koṭiyo
atk-abh02a11:134_4: appatvā ettheva niruddhā, caṅkamane pavattā rūpārūpadhammā ṭhānaṁ appatvā ettheva
atk-abh02a11:134_5: niruddhā, ṭhāne pavattā nisajjaṁ, nisajjāya pavattā sayanaṁ appatvā ettheva niruddhā’ti
atk-abh02a11:134_6: evaṁ pariggaṇhanto pariggaṇhantoyeva bhavaṅgaṁ otāreti; uṭṭhahanto kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvāva
atk-abh02a11:134_7: uṭṭhāti – ayaṁ bhikkhu gatādīsu sampajānakārī nāma hotīti.
atk-abh02a11:135_0: Evaṁ pana sutte kammaṭṭhānaṁ avibhūtaṁ hoti. Kammaṭṭhānaṁ avibhūtaṁ na kātabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:135_1: Tasmā yo bhikkhu yāva sakkoti tāva caṅkamitvā ṭhatvā nisīditvā sayamāno evaṁ pariggahetvā
atk-abh02a11:135_2: sayati – ‘kāyo acetano, mañco acetano. Kāyo na jānāti – ahaṁ mañce sayitoti. Mañcopi
atk-abh02a11:135_3: na jānāti – mayi kāyo sayitoti. Acetano kāyo acetane mañce sayito’ti. Evaṁ pariggaṇhanto
atk-abh02a11:135_4: pariggaṇhantoyeva cittaṁ bhavaṅgaṁ otāreti, pabujjhamāno kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvāva pabujjhati.
atk-abh02a11:136_0: Jāgariteti jāgaraṇe. Tattha ‘kiriyāmayapavattassa appavattiyā sati jāgaritaṁ nāma
atk-abh02a11:136_1: na hoti; kiriyāmayapavattavaḷañje pavattante jāgaritaṁ nāma hotī’ti pariggaṇhanto
