atk-abh02a11:136_2: bhikkhu jāgarite sampajānakārī nāma hoti. Apica rattindivaṁ cha koṭṭhāse katvā pañca
atk-abh02a11:136_3: koṭṭhāse jaggantopi jāgarite sampajānakārī nāma hoti.
atk-abh02a11:137_0: Bhāsiteti kathane. Tattha ‘upādārūpassa saddāyatanassa appavatte sati bhāsitaṁ nāma
atk-abh02a11:137_1: na hoti; tasmiṁ pavattante hotī’ti pariggāhako bhikkhu bhāsite sampajānakārī nāma
atk-abh02a11:137_2: hoti. Vimuttāyatanasīsena dhammaṁ desentopi bāttiṁsa tiracchānakathā pahāya dasakathāvatthunissitaṁ
atk-abh02a11:137_3: kathaṁ kathentopi bhāsite sampajānakārī nāma hoti.
atk-abh02a11:138_0: Tuṇhībhāveti akathane. Tattha ‘upādārūpassa saddāyatanassa pavattiyaṁ sati tuṇhībhāvo
atk-abh02a11:138_1: nāma natthi; appavattiyaṁ hotī’ti pariggāhako bhikkhu tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī nāma
atk-abh02a11:138_2: hoti. Aṭṭhatiṁsāya ārammaṇesu cittaruciyaṁ kammaṭṭhānaṁ gahetvā nisinnopi dutiyajjhānaṁ
atk-abh02a11:139_0: Ettha ca eko iriyāpatho dvīsu ṭhānesu āgato. So heṭṭhā abhikkante paṭikkanteti ettha
atk-abh02a11:139_1: bhikkhācāragāmaṁ gacchato ca āgacchato ca addhānagamanavasena kathito. Gate ṭhite
atk-abh02a11:139_2: nisinneti ettha vihāre cuṇṇikapāduddhārairiyāpathavasena kathitoti veditabbo.
atk-abh02a11:141_0: 526.Sovivittanti iminā kiṁ dasseti? Etassa bhikkhuno upāsanaṭṭhānaṁ yogapathaṁ sappāyasenāsanaṁ
atk-abh02a11:141_1: dasseti. Yassa hi abbhantare ettakā guṇā atthi, tassa anucchaviko araññavāso. Yassa
atk-abh02a11:141_2: panete natthi, tassa ananucchaviko. Evarūpassa hi araññavāso kāḷamakkaṭaacchataracchadīpimigādīnaṁ
atk-abh02a11:141_3: aṭavīvāsasadiso hoti. Kasmā? Icchāya ṭhatvā paviṭṭhattā. Tassa hi araññavāsamūlako
atk-abh02a11:141_4: koci attho natthi; araññavāsañceva āraññake ca dūseti; sāsane appasādaṁ uppādeti.
atk-abh02a11:141_5: Yassa pana abbhantare ettakā guṇā atthi, tasseva so anucchaviko. So hi araññavāsaṁ
atk-abh02a11:141_6: nissāya vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā arahattaṁ gaṇhitvā parinibbāti, sakalaaraññavāsaṁ
atk-abh02a11:141_7: upasobheti, āraññikānaṁ sīsaṁ dhovati, sakalasāsanaṁ pasāreti. Tasmā satthā evarūpassa
atk-abh02a11:141_8: bhikkhuno upāsanaṭṭhānaṁ yogapathaṁ sappāyasenāsanaṁ dassento so vivittaṁ senāsanaṁ
atk-abh02a11:141_9: bhajatītiādimāha. Tattha vivittanti suññaṁ appasaddaṁ appanigghosaṁ. Etameva hi atthaṁ
atk-abh02a11:141_10: dassetuṁ tañca anākiṇṇantiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha anākiṇṇanti asaṅkiṇṇaṁ asambādhaṁ. Tattha
atk-abh02a11:141_11: yassa senāsanassa sāmantā gāvutampi aḍḍhayojanampi pabbatagahanaṁ vanagahanaṁ nadīgahanaṁ
atk-abh02a11:141_12: hoti, na koci avelāya upasaṅkamituṁ sakkoti – idaṁ santikepi anākiṇṇaṁ nāma. Yaṁ
atk-abh02a11:141_13: pana aḍḍhayojanikaṁ vā yojanikaṁ vā hoti – idaṁ dūratāya eva anākiṇṇaṁ nāma hoti.
atk-abh02a11:142_0: 527. Seti ceva āsati ca etthāti senāsanaṁ. Tassa pabhedaṁ dassetuṁ mañco pīṭhantiādi
atk-abh02a11:142_1: vuttaṁ. Tattha mañcoti cattāro mañcā – masārako, bundikābaddho, kuḷīrapādako, āhaccapādakoti.
atk-abh02a11:142_2: Tathā pīṭhaṁ. Bhisīti pañca bhisiyo – uṇṇābhisi, coḷabhisi, vākabhisi, tiṇabhisi,
atk-abh02a11:142_3: paṇṇabhisīti. Bimbohananti sīsupadhānaṁ vuttaṁ. Taṁ vitthārato vidatthicaturaṅgulaṁ
atk-abh02a11:142_4: vaṭṭati, dīghato mañcavitthārappamāṇaṁ. Vihāroti samantā parihārapathaṁ antoyeva
atk-abh02a11:142_5: rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāni dassetvā katasenāsanaṁ. Aḍḍhayogoti supaṇṇavaṅkagehaṁ. Pāsādoti
atk-abh02a11:142_6: dve kaṇṇikāni gahetvā kato dīghapāsādo. Aṭṭoti paṭirājādipaṭibāhanatthaṁ iṭṭhakāhi
atk-abh02a11:142_7: kato bahalabhittiko catupañcabhūmiko patissayaviseso. Māḷoti bhojanasālasadiso maṇḍalamāḷo;
atk-abh02a11:142_8: vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṁ pana ekakūṭasaṅgahito caturassapāsādoti vuttaṁ. Leṇanti pabbataṁ
atk-abh02a11:142_9: khaṇitvā vā pabbhārassa appahonakaṭṭhāne kuṭṭaṁ uṭṭhāpetvā vā katasenāsanaṁ. Guhāti
atk-abh02a11:142_10: bhūmidari vā yattha rattindivaṁ dīpaṁ laddhuṁ vaṭṭati, pabbataguhā vā bhūmiguhā vā.
atk-abh02a11:142_11: Rukkhamūlanti rukkhassa heṭṭhā parikkhittaṁ vā aparikkhittaṁ vā. Veḷugumboti veḷugaccho.
atk-abh02a11:142_12: Yattha vā pana bhikkhū paṭikkamantīti ṭhapetvā vā etāni mañcādīni yattha bhikkhū
atk-abh02a11:142_13: sannipatanti, yaṁ tesaṁ sannipātārahaṭṭhānaṁ, sabbametaṁ senāsanaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:143_0: 528.Bhajatīti upeti. Sambhajatīti tattha abhirativasena anukkaṇṭhito suṭṭhu upeti.
atk-abh02a11:143_1: Sevatīti nivāsanavasena sevati nisevatīti anukkaṇṭhamāno sannisito hutvā sevati.
atk-abh02a11:144_0: 529. Idāni yaṁ taṁ vivittanti vuttaṁ, tassa pabhedaṁ dassetuṁ araññaṁ rukkhamūlantiādi
atk-abh02a11:144_1: āraddhaṁ. Tattha araññanti vinayapariyāyena tāva ‘‘ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca
atk-abh02a11:144_2: avasesaṁ arañña’’nti (pārā. 12) āgataṁ. Suttantapariyāyena āraññikaṁ bhikkhuṁ sandhāya
atk-abh02a11:144_4: pana ubhopi pariyāyadesanā nāma. Abhidhammo nippariyāyadesanāti abhidhammapariyāyena
atk-abh02a11:144_5: araññaṁ dassetuṁ nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlāti vuttaṁ; indakhīlato bahi nikkhamitvāti attho.
atk-abh02a11:145_0: 530. Rukkhamūlādīnaṁ pakatiyā ca suviññeyyabhāvato rukkhamūlaṁyeva rukkhamūlantiādi
atk-abh02a11:145_1: vuttaṁ. Apicettha rukkhamūlanti yaṁkiñci sītacchāyaṁ vivittaṁ rukkhamūlaṁ. Pabbatanti
atk-abh02a11:145_2: selaṁ. Tattha hi udakasoṇḍīsu udakakiccaṁ katvā sītāya rukkhacchāyāya nisinnassa
atk-abh02a11:145_3: nānādisāsu khāyamānāsu sītena vātena bījiyamānassa cittaṁ ekaggaṁ hoti. Kandaranti
atk-abh02a11:145_4: kaṁ vuccati udakaṁ, tena daritaṁ udakena bhinnaṁ pabbatappadesaṁ; yaṁ nitumbantipi
atk-abh02a11:145_5: nadīkuñjantipi vadanti. Tattha hi rajatapaṭṭasadisā vālikā honti, matthake maṇivitānaṁ
atk-abh02a11:145_6: viya vanagahanaṁ, maṇikkhandhasadisaṁ udakaṁ sandati. Evarūpaṁ kandaraṁ oruyha pānīyaṁ
atk-abh02a11:145_7: pivitvā gattāni sītaṁ katvā vālikaṁ ussāpetvā paṁsukūlacīvaraṁ paññapetvā nisinnassa
atk-abh02a11:145_8: samaṇadhammaṁ karoto cittaṁ ekaggaṁ hoti. Giriguhanti dvinnaṁ pabbatānaṁ antaraṁ,
atk-abh02a11:145_9: ekasmiṁyeva vā umaṅgasadisaṁ mahāvivaraṁ. Susānalakkhaṇaṁ visuddhimagge (visuddhi. 1.34) vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:146_0: 531.Vanapatthanti gāmantaṁ atikkamitvā manussānaṁ anupacāraṭṭhānaṁ, yattha na kasanti
atk-abh02a11:146_1: na vapanti. Tenevassa niddese ‘‘vanapatthanti dūrānametaṁ senāsanānaṁ adhivacana’’ntiādi
atk-abh02a11:146_2: vuttaṁ. Yasmā vā rukkhamūlādīsu idamevekaṁ bhājetvā dassitaṁ, tasmāssa nikkhepapaṭipāṭiyā
atk-abh02a11:146_3: niddesaṁ akatvā sabbapariyante niddeso katoti veditabbo. Abbhokāsanti acchannaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:146_4: Ākaṅkhamāno panettha cīvarakuṭiṁ katvā vasati. Palālapuñjanti palālarāsi. Mahāpalālapuñjato
atk-abh02a11:146_5: hi palālaṁ nikkaḍḍhitvā pabbhāraleṇasadise ālaye karonti, gacchagumbādīnampi upari
atk-abh02a11:146_6: palālaṁ pakkhipitvā heṭṭhā nisinnā samaṇadhammaṁ karonti; taṁ sandhāyetaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:146_7: Vanapatthaniddese salomahaṁsānanti yattha paviṭṭhassa lomahaṁso uppajjati; evarūpānaṁ
atk-abh02a11:146_8: bhīsanakasenāsanānaṁ. Pariyantānanti dūrabhāvena pariyante ṭhitānaṁ. Na manussūpacārānanti
atk-abh02a11:146_9: kasanavapanavasena manussehi upacaritabbaṁ vanantaṁ atikkamitvā ṭhitānaṁ. Durabhisambhavānanti
atk-abh02a11:148_1: saddaṭṭhena ekaṁ, tasmāssa niddese ‘‘yadeva taṁ appasaddaṁ tadeva taṁ appanigghosa’’nti
atk-abh02a11:148_2: vuttaṁ. Vijanavātanti anusañcaraṇajanassa sarīravātena virahitaṁ. Vijanavādantipi
atk-abh02a11:148_3: pāṭho; antojanavādena virahitanti attho. Yasmā pana yaṁ appanigghosaṁ, tadeva janasañcaraṇena
atk-abh02a11:148_4: ca janavādena ca virahitaṁ hoti, tasmāssa niddese ‘‘yadeva taṁ appanigghosaṁ tadeva
atk-abh02a11:148_5: taṁ vijanavāta’’nti vuttaṁ. Manussarāhaseyyakanti manussānaṁ rahassakiriyaṭṭhāniyaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:148_6: Yasmā pana taṁ janasañcaraṇarahitaṁ hoti, tenassa niddese ‘‘yadeva taṁ vijanavātaṁ
atk-abh02a11:148_7: tadeva taṁ manussarāhaseyyaka’’nti vuttaṁ. Paṭisallānasāruppanti vivekānurūpaṁ. Yasmā
atk-abh02a11:148_8: pana taṁ niyameneva manussarāhaseyyakaṁ hoti, tasmāssa niddese ‘‘yadeva taṁ manussarāhaseyyakaṁ
atk-abh02a11:149: 534. Araññagatādiniddese araññaṁ vuttameva. Tathā rukkhamūlaṁ. Avasesaṁ pana sabbampi senāsanaṁ suññāgārena saṅgahitaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:150_0: 535.Pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvāti samantato ūrubaddhāsanaṁ bandhitvā. Ujuṁ kāyaṁ paṇidhāyāti
atk-abh02a11:150_1: uparimaṁ sarīraṁ ujuṁ ṭhapetvā aṭṭhārasa piṭṭhikaṇṭake koṭiyā koṭiṁ paṭipādetvā.
atk-abh02a11:150_2: Evañhi nisinnassa cammamaṁsanhārūni na paṇamanti. Athassa yā tesaṁ paṇamanapaccayā
atk-abh02a11:150_3: khaṇe khaṇe vedanā uppajjeyyuṁ, tā nuppajjanti. Tāsu na uppajjamānāsu cittaṁ ekaggaṁ
atk-abh02a11:150_4: hoti, kammaṭṭhānaṁ na paripatati, vuḍḍhiṁ phātiṁ upagacchati.
atk-abh02a11:151: 536.Ujuko hoti kāyo ṭhito paṇihitoti idampi hi imamevatthaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:152_0: 537.Parimukhaṁ satiṁ upaṭṭhapetvāti kammaṭṭhānābhimukhaṁ satiṁ ṭhapayitvā, mukhasamīpe
atk-abh02a11:152_1: vā katvāti attho. Teneva vuttaṁ ‘‘ayaṁ sati upaṭṭhitā hoti sūpaṭṭhitā nāsikagge vā
atk-abh02a11:152_2: mukhanimitte vā’’ti. Mukhanimittanti cettha uttaroṭṭhassa vemajjhappadeso daṭṭhabbo,
atk-abh02a11:152_3: yattha nāsikavāto paṭihaññati; atha vā parīti pariggahaṭṭho, mukhanti niyyānaṭṭho,
atk-abh02a11:152_4: satīti upaṭṭhānaṭṭho; tena vuccati ‘‘parimukhaṁ sati’’nti evaṁ paṭisambhidāyaṁ (paṭi.
atk-abh02a11:152_5: ma. 1.164) vuttanayenapettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Tatrāyaṁ saṅkhepo ‘‘pariggahitaniyyānaṁ satiṁ katvā’’ti.
atk-abh02a11:153_0: 538. Abhijjhāniddeso uttānatthoyeva. Ayaṁ panettha saṅkhepavaṇṇanā – abhijjhaṁ loke
atk-abh02a11:153_1: pahāyāti lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena pañcupādānakkhandhā loko. Tasmā pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu
atk-abh02a11:153_2: rāgaṁ pahāya kāmacchandaṁ vikkhambhetvāti ayamettha attho.
atk-abh02a11:154: 539.Vigatābhijjhenāti vikkhambhanavasena pahīnattā vigatābhijjhena, na cakkhuviññāṇasadisenāti attho.
atk-abh02a11:155_0: 541.Abhijjhāyacittaṁ parisodhetīti abhijjhāto cittaṁ parisodheti; yathā naṁ sā muñcati
atk-abh02a11:155_1: ceva, muñcitvā ca na puna gaṇhāti, evaṁ karotīti attho. Niddesapadesu panassa āsevanto
atk-abh02a11:155_2: sodheti, bhāvento visodheti, bahulīkaronto parisodhetīti evamattho veditabbo. Mocetītiādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh02a11:156_0: 542-543.Byāpādadosaṁ pahāyātiādīnampi imināva nayena attho veditabbo. Byāpajjati
atk-abh02a11:156_1: iminā cittaṁ pūtikummāsādayo viya pakatiṁ jahatīti byāpādo. Vikārappattiyā padussati,
atk-abh02a11:156_2: paraṁ vā padūseti vināsetīti padoso. Ubhayametaṁ kodhassevādhivacanaṁ. Teneva vuttaṁ
atk-abh02a11:156_3: ‘‘yo byāpādo so padoso; yo padoso so byāpādo’’ti. Yasmā cesa sabbasaṅgāhikavasena
atk-abh02a11:157_0: 546. Thinaṁ cittagelaññaṁ, middhaṁ cetasikagelaññaṁ; thinañca middhañca thinamiddhaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:157_1: Santā hontīti ime dvepi dhammā nirodhasantatāya santā hontīti. Idaṁ sandhāyettha vacanabhedo kato.
atk-abh02a11:158: 549.Ālokasaññīti rattimpi divāpi diṭṭhālokasañjānanasamatthāya vigatanīvaraṇāya parisuddhāya saññāya samannāgato.
atk-abh02a11:159: 550.Sato sampajānoti satiyā ca ñāṇena ca samannāgato. Idaṁ ubhayaṁ ālokasaññāya upakārakattā vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:160_0: 553. Vigatathinamiddhatāya pana ālokasaññāya niddesapadesu cattattātiādīni aññamaññavevacanāneva
atk-abh02a11:160_1: . Tattha cattattāti cattakāraṇā. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Cattattāti idaṁ panettha
atk-abh02a11:160_2: sakabhāvapariccajanavasena vuttaṁ. Vantattāti idaṁ puna anādiyanabhāvadassanavasena.
atk-abh02a11:160_3: Muttattāti idaṁ santatito vinimocanavasena. Pahīnattāti idaṁ muttassāpi katthaci
atk-abh02a11:160_4: ṭhānābhāvavasena. Paṭinissaṭṭhattāti idaṁ pubbe ādinnapubbassa nissaggadassanavasena.
atk-abh02a11:160_5: Paṭimuñcato vā nissaṭṭhattā bhāvanābalena abhibhuyya nissaṭṭhattāti attho. Pahīnapaṭinissaṭṭhattāti
atk-abh02a11:160_6: yathāvikkhambhanavaseneva pahānaṁ hoti, punappunaṁ santatiṁ na ajjhāruhati, tathā
atk-abh02a11:160_7: paṭinissaṭṭhattāti. Ālokā hotīti sappabhā hoti. Nirāvaraṇaṭṭhena vivaṭā. Nirupakkilesaṭṭhena
atk-abh02a11:161: 556.Uddhaccakukkuccanti ettha uddhatākāro uddhaccaṁ, ārammaṇe anicchayatāya vatthujjhācāro kukkuccaṁ. Idhāpi ‘‘santā hontī’’ti purimanayeneva vacanabhedo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a11:162_0: 558.Tiṇṇavicikicchoti vicikicchaṁ taritvā atikkamitvā ṭhito. Niddesepissa tiṇṇoti
atk-abh02a11:162_1: idaṁ vicikicchāya animuggabhāvadassanavasena vuttaṁ. Uttiṇṇoti idaṁ tassā atikkamadassanavasena.
atk-abh02a11:162_2: Nittiṇṇoti idaṁ bhāvanābalena abhibhuyya upaddave tiṇṇabhāvadassanavasena. Pāraṅgatoti
atk-abh02a11:162_3: nibbicikicchābhāvasaṅkhātaṁ vicikicchāpāraṁ gato. Pāramanuppattoti tadeva pāraṁ bhāvanānuyogena
atk-abh02a11:163_1: Kusalesu dhammesūti anavajjadhammesu. Na kaṅkhatīti ‘ime nu kho kusalā’ti kaṅkhaṁ
atk-abh02a11:163_2: na uppādeti. Na vicikicchatīti te dhamme sabhāvato vinicchetuṁ na kicchati, na kilamati.
atk-abh02a11:163_3: Akathaṁkathī hotīti ‘kathaṁ nu kho ime kusalā’ti kathaṁkathāya rahito hoti. Nikkathaṁkathī
atk-abh02a11:163_4: vigatakathaṁkathoti tasseva vevacanaṁ. Vacanattho panettha kathaṁkathāto nikkhantoti
atk-abh02a11:164: 562.Upakkileseti upakkilesabhūte. Te hi cittaṁ upagantvā kilissanti. Tasmā upakkilesāti vuccanti.
atk-abh02a11:165_0: 563.Paññāyadubbalīkaraṇeti yasmā ime nīvaraṇā uppajjamānā anuppannāya lokiyalokuttarāya
atk-abh02a11:165_1: paññāya uppajjituṁ na denti, uppannā api aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañca vā abhiññāyo upacchinditvā
atk-abh02a11:165_2: pātenti, tasmā ‘paññāya dubbalīkaraṇā’ti vuccanti. ‘Anuppannā ceva paññā na uppajjati,
atk-abh02a11:165_3: uppannā ca paññā nirujjhatī’ti idampi hi imamevatthaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ. Sesamettha
atk-abh02a11:165_4: sabbaṁ heṭṭhā tattha tattha pakāsitattā uttānatthameva.
atk-abh02a11:166_0: 564.Vivicceva kāmehītiādīsupi niddesesu yaṁ vattabbaṁ siyā, taṁ heṭṭhā cittuppādakaṇḍe
atk-abh02a11:166_1: (dha. sa. aṭṭha. 160) rūpāvacaraniddese idheva ca tattha tattha vuttameva. Kevalañhi
atk-abh02a11:166_2: dutiyatatiyacatutthajjhānaniddesesupi yathā tāni jhānāni heṭṭhā ‘tivaṅgikaṁ jhānaṁ
atk-abh02a11:166_3: hoti, duvaṅgikaṁ jhānaṁ hotī’ti vuttāni, evaṁ avatvā ‘‘ajjhattaṁ sampasādana’’ntiādivacanato
atk-abh02a11:166_4: pariyāyena sampasādādīhi saddhiṁ tāni aṅgāni gahetvā ‘‘jhānanti sampasādo pītisukhaṁ
atk-abh02a11:166_5: cittassekaggatā’’tiādinā nayena taṁ taṁ jhānaṁ niddiṭṭhanti ayamettha viseso.
atk-abh02a11:167_0: 588.Yaṁ taṁ ariyā ācikkhantītipadaniddese pana kiñcāpi ‘ācikkhanti desentī’tiādīni
atk-abh02a11:167_1: sabbāneva aññamaññavevacanāni, evaṁ santepi ‘upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī’tiādiuddesavasena
atk-abh02a11:167_2: ācikkhanti, niddesavasena desenti, paṭiniddesavasena paññāpenti, tena tena pakārena
atk-abh02a11:167_3: atthaṁ ṭhapetvā paṭṭhapenti, tassa tassatthassa kāraṇaṁ dassentā vivaranti, byañjanavibhāgaṁ
atk-abh02a11:167_4: dassentā vibhajanti, nikkujjitabhāvaṁ gambhīrabhāvañca nīharitvā vā sotūnaṁ ñāṇassa
atk-abh02a11:167_5: patiṭṭhaṁ janayantā uttāniṁ karonti, sabbehipi imehi ākārehi sotūnaṁ aññāṇandhakāraṁ
atk-abh02a11:168: Samatikkamaniddesepi tattha tattha tehi tehi dhammehi vuṭṭhitattā atikkamanto, uparibhūmippattiyā vītikkanto, tato aparihānibhāvena samatikkantoti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-abh02a11:171_0: 623. Abhidhammabhājanīye heṭṭhā cittuppādakaṇḍe āgatanayeneva tanti ṭhapitā. Tasmā
atk-abh02a11:171_1: tattha sabbesampi kusalavipākakiriyavasena niddiṭṭhānaṁ jhānānaṁ tattha vuttanayeneva
atk-abh02a11:171_2: attho veditabbo. Suddhikanavakādibhedopi sabbo tattha vuttasadisoyevāti.
atk-abh02a11:174_0: 638. Pañhāpucchake pāḷianusāreneva jhānānaṁ kusalādibhāvo veditabbo. Ārammaṇattikesu
atk-abh02a11:174_1: pana tiṇṇaṁ jhānānaṁ nimittārammaṇattā parittārammaṇādibhāvena navattabbatā veditabbā.
atk-abh02a11:174_2: Lokuttarā panettha maggakāle phalakāle vā siyā appamāṇārammaṇā. Catutthaṁ jhānaṁ
atk-abh02a11:174_3: siyā parittārammaṇanti ettha kusalato terasa catutthajjhānāni sabbatthapādakacatutthaṁ,
atk-abh02a11:176_0: Iddhividhacatutthaṁ cittavasena kāyaṁ pariṇāmentassa adissamānena kāyena pāṭihāriyakaraṇe
atk-abh02a11:176_1: kāyārammaṇattā parittārammaṇaṁ, kāyavasena cittaṁ pariṇāmentassa dissamānena kāyena
atk-abh02a11:176_2: pāṭihāriyaṁ katvā brahmalokaṁ gacchantassa samāpatticittārammaṇattā mahaggatārammaṇaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:178_2: pana puthujjano puthujjanānaṁyeva cittaṁ jānāti, na ariyānaṁ. Sotāpanno sotāpannassa
atk-abh02a11:178_3: ceva puthujjanassa ca; sakadāgāmī sakadāgāmino ceva heṭṭhimānañca dvinnaṁ; anāgāmī
atk-abh02a11:178_4: anāgāmino ceva heṭṭhimānañca tiṇṇaṁ; khīṇāsavo sabbesampi jānāti.
atk-abh02a11:182_0: Anāgataṁsañāṇacatutthaṁ anāgate kāmadhātuyā nibbattijānanakāle parittārammaṇaṁ, rūpārūpabhavesu
atk-abh02a11:182_2: bhāvessanti, phalaṁ sacchikarissantī’’ti jānanakāle appamāṇārammaṇaṁ, ‘‘anāgate saṅkho
atk-abh02a11:182_3: nāma rājā bhavissatī’’tiādinā (dī. ni. 3.108) nayena nāmagottānussaraṇakāle navattabbārammaṇaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:185_0: Kiriyatopi tesaṁ dvādasannaṁ jhānānaṁ idameva ārammaṇavidhānaṁ. Tīṇi jhānāni namaggārammaṇāti
atk-abh02a11:185_1: paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṁ vā cetopariyādiñāṇaṁ vā maggaṁ ārammaṇaṁ kareyya, tīṇi jhānāni
atk-abh02a11:185_2: tathā appavattito namaggārammaṇā, sahajātahetuvasena pana siyā maggahetukā; vīriyajeṭṭhikāya
atk-abh02a11:185_3: vā vīmaṁsājeṭṭhikāya vā maggabhāvanāya maggādhipatino; chandacittajeṭṭhakakāle phalakāle ca navattabbā.
atk-abh02a11:186_0: Catutthaṁ jhānanti idhāpi kusalato terasasu catutthajjhānesu sabbatthapādakaiddhividhadibbasotadibbacakkhuyathākammūpagañāṇacatutthañceva
atk-abh02a11:186_2: pana maggārammaṇaṁ hoti. Na vattabbaṁ maggahetukaṁ maggādhipatīti vā; lokuttaracatutthaṁ
atk-abh02a11:186_3: maggārammaṇaṁ na hoti; maggakāle pana sahajātahetuvasena maggahetukaṁ; vīriyavīmaṁsājeṭṭhikāya
atk-abh02a11:186_4: maggabhāvanāya maggādhipati; chandacittajeṭṭhikāya ceva maggabhāvanāya phalakāle
atk-abh02a11:186_5: ca na vattabbaṁ. Kiriyatopi dvādasasu jhānesu ayameva nayo.
atk-abh02a11:187: Tīṇi jhānāni na vattabbāti atītādīsu ekadhammampi ārabbha appavattito navattabbāti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a11:188_0: Catutthaṁ jhānanti kusalato terasasu catutthajjhānesu sabbatthapādakacatutthaṁ navattabbārammaṇameva.
atk-abh02a11:188_2: ‘‘anāgate imāni pupphāni mā milāyiṁsu, dīpā mā nibbāyiṁsu, eko aggikkhandho samuṭṭhātu,
atk-abh02a11:188_3: pabbato samuṭṭhātū’’ti adhiṭṭhānakāle anāgatārammaṇaṁ; cittavasena kāyapariṇāmanakāle
atk-abh02a11:188_7: ‘‘Yathā imassa bhoto manosaṅkhārā paṇihitā imassa cittassa anantarā amuṁ nāma vitakkaṁ
atk-abh02a11:188_8: vitakkessatīti. So bahuñcepi ādisati, tatheva taṁ hoti no aññathā’’ti iminā hi suttena
atk-abh02a11:188_10: paccuppannaṁ ārabbha pavattikāle paccuppannārammaṇaṁ. Vitthārakathā panettha heṭṭhāaṭṭhakathākaṇḍavaṇṇanāyaṁ
atk-abh02a11:189_2: Yathākammūpagañāṇacatutthaṁ atītakammameva ārammaṇaṁ karotīti atītārammaṇaṁ. Anāgataṁsañāṇacatutthaṁ
atk-abh02a11:190: Tīṇijhānāni bahiddhārammaṇāti ajjhattato bahiddhābhūtaṁ nimittaṁ ārabbha pavattito bahiddhārammaṇā.
atk-abh02a11:191: Catutthaṁ jhānanti idhāpi kusalato terasasu catutthajjhānesu sabbatthapādakacatutthaṁ bahiddhārammaṇameva.
atk-abh02a11:192_0: Iddhividhacatutthaṁ kāyavasena cittapariṇāmanepi cittavasena kāyapariṇāmanepi attanova
atk-abh02a11:193: Dibbasotañāṇacatutthaṁ attano kucchigatasaddārammaṇakāle ajjhattārammaṇaṁ, parassa saddārammaṇakāle bahiddhārammaṇaṁ, ubhayavasenāpi ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:195: Pubbenivāsañāṇacatutthaṁ attano khandhānussaraṇakāle ajjhattārammaṇaṁ, parassa khandhānañceva nāmagottassa ca anussaraṇakāle bahiddhārammaṇaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:196: Dibbacakkhuñāṇacatutthaṁ attano rūpārammaṇakāle ajjhattārammaṇaṁ, parassa rūpārammaṇakāle bahiddhārammaṇaṁ, ubhayavasenāpi ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:197: Yathākammūpagañāṇacatutthaṁ attano kammajānanakāle ajjhattārammaṇaṁ, parassa kammajānanakāle bahiddhārammaṇaṁ, ubhayavasenāpi ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇaṁ.
atk-abh02a11:198_0: Anāgataṁsañāṇacatutthaṁ attano anāgate nibbattijānanakāle ajjhattārammaṇaṁ, parassa
atk-abh02a11:198_1: khandhānussaraṇakāle ceva nāmagottānussaraṇakāle ca bahiddhārammaṇaṁ, ubhayavasenāpi
atk-abh02a11:200: Lokuttaracatutthaṁ bahiddhārammaṇameva. Kiriyatopi dvādasasu jhānesu ayameva nayoti.
atk-abh02a11:201_0: Imasmiṁ pana jhānavibhaṅge sammāsambuddhena suttantabhājanīyepi lokiyalokuttaramissakāneva
atk-abh02a11:201_1: jhānāni kathitāni; abhidhammabhājanīyepi pañhāpucchakepi. Tayopi hi ete nayā tebhūmakadhammamissakattā
atk-abh02a11:201_2: ekaparicchedā eva. Evamayaṁ jhānavibhaṅgopi teparivaṭṭaṁ nīharitvāva bhājetvā dassitoti.
